4633328Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass SwitchDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<Type, Action<object>> _dict;Di2015NewLine    private Action<object> defaultCase;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Switch(params KeyValuePair<Type, Action<object>>[] cases)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _dict = new Dictionary<Type, Action<object>>(cases.Length);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var entry in cases)Di2015NewLine            if (entry.Key == null)Di2015NewLine                defaultCase = entry.Value;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                _dict.Add(entry.Key, entry.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Execute(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var type = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLine        if (_dict.ContainsKey(type))Di2015NewLine            _dict[type](obj);Di2015NewLine        else if (defaultCase != null)Di2015NewLine            defaultCase(obj);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLine

4633425Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Shuffle<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, Random rng)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T[] elements = source.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < elements.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Find an item we haven't returned yetDi2015NewLine        int swapIndex = i + rng.Next(elements.Length - i);Di2015NewLine        T tmp = elements[i];Di2015NewLine        yield return elements[swapIndex];Di2015NewLine        elements[swapIndex] = tmp;Di2015NewLine        // Note that we don't need to copy the value into elements[i],Di2015NewLine        // as we'll never use that value again.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4633425Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<Submission> GetRandomWinners(int competitionId, Random rng)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<Submission> submissions = new List<Submission>();Di2015NewLine    int winnerCount = DbContext().CompetitionsDi2015NewLine                                 .Single(s => s.CompetitionId == competitionId)Di2015NewLine                                 .NumberWinners;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var correctEntries = DbContext().SubmissionsDi2015NewLine                                    .Where(s => s.CompetitionId == id && Di2015NewLine                                                s.CorrectAnswer)Di2015NewLine                                    .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return correctEntries.Shuffle(rng).Take(winnerCount).ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Success!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                command.StatusCode = {Di2015NewLine            switch (command.LoggingLevel)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case Busker.Data.Constants.LoggingLevel.Debug:Di2015NewLine default:Di2015NewLine                    Loggy.Add(msg);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 4638716Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction imgC = AverageImages(imgA, imgB, weight)Di2015NewLine%# AverageImages - average two input images according to a specified weight.Di2015NewLine%# The two input images must be of the same size and data type.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if weight < 0 || weight > 1Di2015NewLine        error('Weight out of range.')Di2015NewLine    endDi2015NewLine    c = class(imgA);Di2015NewLine    if strcmp(c, class(imgB)) != 1Di2015NewLine        error('Images should be of the same datatype.')Di2015NewLine    endDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    %# Use double matrices for averaging so we don't lose a bitDi2015NewLine    x = double(imgA);Di2015NewLine    y = double(imgB);Di2015NewLine    z = weight*x + (1-weight)*y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    imgC = cast(z, c); %# return the same datatype as the input imagesDi2015NewLine

4638805Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void listView1_ColumnClick(object sender, ColumnClickEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Determine if clicked column is already the column that is being sorted.Di2015NewLine        if (e.Column == _lvwItemComparer.SortColumn)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Reverse the current sort direction for this column.Di2015NewLine            if (_lvwItemComparer.Order == SortOrder.Ascending)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _lvwItemComparer.Order = SortOrder.Descending;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _lvwItemComparer.Order = SortOrder.Ascending;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Set the column number that is to be sorted; default to ascending.Di2015NewLine            _lvwItemComparer.SortColumn = e.Column;Di2015NewLine            _lvwItemComparer.Order = SortOrder.Ascending;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Perform the sort with these new sort options.Di2015NewLine        listView1.Sort();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
4638805Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ListViewItemComparer : IComparerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Specifies the column to be sortedDi2015NewLine    private int ColumnToSort;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Specifies the order in which to sort (i.e. 'Ascending').Di2015NewLine    private  SortOrder OrderOfSort;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Case insensitive comparer objectDi2015NewLine    private CaseInsensitiveComparer ObjectCompare;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Class constructor, initializes various elementsDi2015NewLine    public ListViewItemComparer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Initialize the column to '0'Di2015NewLine        ColumnToSort = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Initialize the sort order to 'none'Di2015NewLine        OrderOfSort = SortOrder.None;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Initialize the CaseInsensitiveComparer objectDi2015NewLine        ObjectCompare = new CaseInsensitiveComparer();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This method is inherited from the IComparer interface.Di2015NewLine    // It compares the two objects passed using a caseDi2015NewLine    // insensitive comparison.Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // x: First object to be comparedDi2015NewLine    // y: Second object to be comparedDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // The result of the comparison. "0" if equal,Di2015NewLine    // negative if 'x' is less than 'y' andDi2015NewLine    // positive if 'x' is greater than 'y'Di2015NewLine    public int Compare(object x, object y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int compareResult;Di2015NewLine        ListViewItem listviewX, listviewY;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Cast the objects to be compared to ListViewItem objectsDi2015NewLine        listviewX = (ListViewItem)x;Di2015NewLine        listviewY = (ListViewItem)y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Determine whether the type being compared is a date type.Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Parse the two objects passed as a parameter as a DateTime.Di2015NewLine            DateTime firstDate  = DateTime.Parse(listviewX.SubItems[ColumnToSort].Text);Di2015NewLine            DateTime secondDate = DateTime.Parse(listviewY.SubItems[ColumnToSort].Text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Compare the two dates.Di2015NewLine            compareResult = DateTime.Compare(firstDate, secondDate);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If neither compared object has a valid date format,Di2015NewLine        // perform a Case Insensitive SortDi2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int num1 = int.Parse(listviewX.SubItems[ColumnToSort].Text);Di2015NewLine                int num2 = int.Parse(listviewY.SubItems[ColumnToSort].Text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Compare the two dates.Di2015NewLine                compareResult = num1.CompareTo(num2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               // Case Insensitive CompareDi2015NewLine                compareResult = ObjectCompare.Compare(Di2015NewLine                listviewX.SubItems[ColumnToSort].Text,Di2015NewLine                listviewY.SubItems[ColumnToSort].TextDi2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Calculate correct return value based on object comparisonDi2015NewLine        if (OrderOfSort == SortOrder.Ascending)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Ascending sort is selected, return normal result of compare operationDi2015NewLine            return compareResult;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (OrderOfSort == SortOrder.Descending)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Descending sort is selected, return negative result of compare operationDi2015NewLine            return (-compareResult);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Return '0' to indicate they are equalDi2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Gets or sets the number of the column to which toDi2015NewLine    // apply the sorting operation (Defaults to '0').Di2015NewLine    public int SortColumnDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ColumnToSort = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ColumnToSort;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Gets or sets the order of sorting to applyDi2015NewLine    // (for example, 'Ascending' or 'Descending').Di2015NewLine    public SortOrder OrderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            OrderOfSort = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return OrderOfSort;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

4639083Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IList<T> CreateSortView(string property)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IList<T> sortView;Di2015NewLine    if (mSortListViews.ContainsKey(property) == false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create sorted viewDi2015NewLine        sortView = this.OrderBy(x => x, new GenericPropertyComparer<T>(property)).ToList();Di2015NewLine        mSortListViews.Add(property, sortView);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sortView = mSortListViews[property];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sortView;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4639083Di2015UniqueSeparatorGenericPropertyComparer
4639083Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass GenericPropertyComparer<T> : IComparer<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public GenericPropertyComparer(string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var property = typeof(T).GetProperty(propertyName, BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (property == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("property doesn't specify a valid property");Di2015NewLine        if (property.CanRead == false)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("property specify a write-only property");Di2015NewLine        if (property.PropertyType.GetInterface("IComparable") == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("property type doesn't IComparable");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        mSortingProperty = property;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IComparable propX = (IComparable)mSortingProperty.GetValue(x, null);Di2015NewLine        IComparable propY = (IComparable)mSortingProperty.GetValue(y, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (propX.CompareTo(propY));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private PropertyInfo mSortingProperty = null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4639437Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyPeriodicTasks : PeriodicMultipleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The first task will start 30 seconds after this class is instantiated and started:Di2015NewLine    protected override TimeSpan FirstInterval { get { return TimeSpan.FromSeconds(30); } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyPeriodicTasks()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Tasks = new[] {Di2015NewLine            new Task { Action = task1, MinInterval = TimeSpan.FromMinutes(5) },Di2015NewLine            new Task { Action = task2, MinInterval = TimeSpan.FromMinutes(15) },Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void task1() { /* code that gets executed once every 5 minutes */ }Di2015NewLine    private void task2() { /* code that gets executed once every 15 minutes */ }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4639437Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar tasks = new MyPeriodicTasks();Di2015NewLinetasks.Start();Di2015NewLine

4639437Di2015UniqueSeparatorStart
4639437Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Encapsulates a class performing a certain activity periodically, which can be initiated onceDi2015NewLine/// and then permanently shut down, but not paused/resumed. The class owns its own separateDi2015NewLine/// thread, and manages this thread all by itself. The periodic task is executed on this thread.Di2015NewLine/// <para>The chief differences to <see cref="System.Threading.Timer"/> are as follows. ThisDi2015NewLine/// class will never issue overlapping activities, even if an activity takes much longer than the interval;Di2015NewLine/// the interval is between the end of the previous occurrence of the activity and the start of the next.Di2015NewLine/// The activity is executed on a foreground thread (by default), and thus will complete once started,Di2015NewLine/// unless a catastrophic abort occurs. When shutting down the activity, it's possible to wait until theDi2015NewLine/// last occurrence, if any, has completed fully.</para>Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic abstract class PeriodicDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Thread _thread;Di2015NewLine    private CancellationTokenSource _cancellation;Di2015NewLine    private ManualResetEvent _exited;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Override to indicate how long to wait between the call to <see cref="Start"/> and the first occurrenceDi2015NewLine    /// of the periodic activity.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    protected abstract TimeSpan FirstInterval { get; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Override to indicate how long to wait between second and subsequent occurrences of the periodic activity.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    protected abstract TimeSpan SubsequentInterval { get; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Override with a method that performs the desired periodic activity. If this method throws an exceptionDi2015NewLine    /// the thread will terminate, but the <see cref="LastActivity"/> will occur nevertheless.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    protected abstract void PeriodicActivity();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Override with a method that performs an activity on the same thread as <see cref="PeriodicActivity"/> duringDi2015NewLine    /// shutdown, just before signalling that the shutdown is complete. The default implementation of this methodDi2015NewLine    /// does nothing. This method is guaranteed to be called during a shutdown, even if the shutdown is due to anDi2015NewLine    /// exception propagating outside of <see cref="PeriodicActivity"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    protected virtual void LastActivity() { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Returns false before the first call to <see cref="Start"/> and after the first call to <see cref="Shutdown"/>;Di2015NewLine    /// true between them.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public bool IsRunning { get { return _cancellation != null && !_cancellation.IsCancellationRequested; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Schedules the periodic activity to start occurring. This method may only be called once.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="backgroundThread">By default (false) the class will use a foreground thread, preventing application shutdown until the thread has terminated. If true, a background thread will be created instead.</param>Di2015NewLine    public virtual void Start(bool backgroundThread = false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_thread != null)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException(string.Format("\\"Start\\" called multiple times ({0})", GetType().Name));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _exited = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine        _cancellation = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine        _thread = new Thread(threadProc) { IsBackground = backgroundThread };Di2015NewLine        _thread.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private volatile bool _periodicActivityRunning = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Causes the periodic activity to stop occurring. If called while the activity is being performed,Di2015NewLine    /// will wait until the activity has completed before returning. Ensures that <see cref="IsRunning"/>Di2015NewLine    /// is false once this method returns.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public virtual bool Shutdown(bool waitForExit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (waitForExit && _periodicActivityRunning && Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId == _thread.ManagedThreadId)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Cannot call Shutdown(true) from within PeriodicActivity() on the same thread (this would cause a deadlock).");Di2015NewLine        if (_cancellation == null || _cancellation.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        _cancellation.Cancel();Di2015NewLine        if (waitForExit)Di2015NewLine            _exited.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void threadProc()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _cancellation.Token.WaitHandle.WaitOne(FirstInterval);Di2015NewLine            while (!_cancellation.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _periodicActivityRunning = true;Di2015NewLine                PeriodicActivity();Di2015NewLine                _periodicActivityRunning = false;Di2015NewLine                _cancellation.Token.WaitHandle.WaitOne(SubsequentInterval);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            try { LastActivity(); }Di2015NewLine            finally { _exited.Set(); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// <para>Encapsulates a class performing multiple related yet independent tasks on the same threadDi2015NewLine/// at a certain minimum interval each. Schedules the activity that is the most late at every opportunity,Di2015NewLine/// but will never execute more than one activity at a time (as they all share the same thread).</para>Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic abstract class PeriodicMultiple : PeriodicDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Used to define the activities to be executed periodically.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    protected sealed class TaskDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>The activity to be performed.</summary>Di2015NewLine        public Action Action;Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>The mimimum interval at which this activity should be repeated. May be delayed arbitrarily though.</summary>Di2015NewLine        public TimeSpan MinInterval;Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Stores the last time this activity was executed.</summary>Di2015NewLine        public DateTime LastExecuted;Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Calculates by how much this activity has been delayed. Is used internally to pick the next activity to run. Returns negative values for activities that aren't due yet.</summary>Di2015NewLine        public TimeSpan DelayedBy()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (LastExecuted == default(DateTime))Di2015NewLine                return TimeSpan.FromDays(1000) - MinInterval; // to run shortest interval first when none of the tasks have ever executedDi2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                return (DateTime.UtcNow - LastExecuted) - MinInterval;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>If desired, override to provide a custom interval at which the schedulerDi2015NewLine    /// should re-check whether any activity is due to start. Defaults to 1 second.</summary>Di2015NewLine    protected override TimeSpan SubsequentInterval { get { return TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1); } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Initialise this with the list of activities to be executed.</summary>Di2015NewLine    protected IList<Task> Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>For internal use.</summary>Di2015NewLine    protected sealed override void PeriodicActivity()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TimeSpan maxDelay = TimeSpan.MinValue;Di2015NewLine        Task maxDelayTask = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var task in Tasks)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var delayedBy = task.DelayedBy();Di2015NewLine            if (maxDelay < delayedBy && delayedBy > TimeSpan.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                maxDelay = delayedBy;Di2015NewLine                maxDelayTask = task;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (maxDelayTask != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            maxDelayTask.LastExecuted = DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLine            maxDelayTask.Action();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4639437Di2015UniqueSeparatorSubsequentInterval
4639503Di2015UniqueSeparatorlabel1.BackColor = System.Drawing.Color.Transparent;Di2015NewLine

4639929Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool Equals(T value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // uses Reflection to check if a Type-specific `Equals` exists...Di2015NewLine   var specificEquals = typeof(T).GetMethod("Equals", new Type[] { typeof(T) });Di2015NewLine   if (specificEquals != null &&Di2015NewLine       specificEquals.ReturnType == typeof(bool))Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       return (bool)specificEquals.Invoke(this.Value, new object[]{value});Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   return this.Value.Equals(value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4641220Di2015UniqueSeparatorPropertyInfo GetImplementedProperty(PropertyInfo pi)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var type = pi.DeclaringType;Di2015NewLine    var interfaces = type.GetInterfaces();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (interfaces.Length == 0) {Di2015NewLine        return pi;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var flags = BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public;Di2015NewLine    var query = from iface in interfacesDi2015NewLine                let implementedProperty = iface.GetProperty(pi.Name, flags)Di2015NewLine                where implementedProperty != piDi2015NewLine                select implementedProperty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return query.DefaultIfEmpty(pi).First();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4647720Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLinenamespace SampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class DataGridViewProgressColumn : DataGridViewImageColumnDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public DataGridViewProgressColumn()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CellTemplate = new DataGridViewProgressCell();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinenamespace SampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class DataGridViewProgressCell : DataGridViewImageCellDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Used to make custom cell consistent with a DataGridViewImageCellDi2015NewLine        static Image emptyImage;Di2015NewLine        static DataGridViewProgressCell()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            emptyImage = new Bitmap(1, 1, System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public DataGridViewProgressCell()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.ValueType = typeof(int);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Method required to make the Progress Cell consistent with the default Image Cell. Di2015NewLine        // The default Image Cell assumes an Image as a value, although the value of the Progress Cell is an int.Di2015NewLine        protected override object GetFormattedValue(object value,Di2015NewLine                            int rowIndex, ref DataGridViewCellStyle cellStyle,Di2015NewLine                            TypeConverter valueTypeConverter,Di2015NewLine                            TypeConverter formattedValueTypeConverter,Di2015NewLine                            DataGridViewDataErrorContexts context)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return emptyImage;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    protected override void Paint(System.Drawing.Graphics g, System.Drawing.Rectangle clipBounds, System.Drawing.Rectangle cellBounds, int rowIndex, DataGridViewElementStates cellState, object value, object formattedValue, string errorText, DataGridViewCellStyle cellStyle, DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle advancedBorderStyle, DataGridViewPaintParts paintParts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int progressVal = (int)value;Di2015NewLine            float percentage = ((float)progressVal / 100.0f); // Need to convert to float before division; otherwise C# returns int which is 0 for anything but 100%.Di2015NewLine            Brush backColorBrush = new SolidBrush(cellStyle.BackColor);Di2015NewLine            Brush foreColorBrush = new SolidBrush(cellStyle.ForeColor);Di2015NewLine            // Draws the cell gridDi2015NewLine            base.Paint(g, clipBounds, cellBounds,Di2015NewLine             rowIndex, cellState, value, formattedValue, errorText,Di2015NewLine             cellStyle, advancedBorderStyle, (paintParts & ~DataGridViewPaintParts.ContentForeground));Di2015NewLine            if (percentage > 0.0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Draw the progress bar and the textDi2015NewLine                g.FillRectangle(new SolidBrush(Color.FromArgb(203, 235, 108)), cellBounds.X + 2, cellBounds.Y + 2, Convert.ToInt32((percentage * cellBounds.Width - 4)), cellBounds.Height - 4);Di2015NewLine                g.DrawString(progressVal.ToString() + "%", cellStyle.Font, foreColorBrush, cellBounds.X+(cellBounds.Width/2)-5, cellBounds.Y + 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // draw the textDi2015NewLine                if (this.DataGridView.CurrentRow.Index == rowIndex)Di2015NewLine                    g.DrawString(progressVal.ToString() + "%", cellStyle.Font, new SolidBrush(cellStyle.SelectionForeColor), cellBounds.X + 6, cellBounds.Y + 2);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    g.DrawString(progressVal.ToString() + "%", cellStyle.Font, foreColorBrush, cellBounds.X + 6, cellBounds.Y + 2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4648010Di2015UniqueSeparatorMatch match = Regex.Match(subjectString, Di2015NewLine    @"(.*?)     # Match any number of characters and capture themDi2015NewLine    =\\{         # Match ={Di2015NewLine    (           # Match and capture the following group:Di2015NewLine     (?:        # One or more occurences of the following:Di2015NewLine      (?>[^$]+) # One or more characters except $, match possessively and captureDi2015NewLine      \\$?       # Match the delimiting $ (optionally, because it's not there after the last item)Di2015NewLine     )+         # End of repeating groupDi2015NewLine    )           # End of capturing groupDi2015NewLine    \\}          # Match }Di2015NewLine    ", Di2015NewLine    RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Matched text: {0}", match.Value);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Word1 = \\"{0}\\"", match.Groups[1].Value);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Word2 = \\"{0}\\"", match.Groups[2].Value);    Di2015NewLinecaptureCtr = 0;Di2015NewLineforeach (Capture capture in match.Groups[3].Captures) {Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("      Capture {0}: {1}", Di2015NewLine                             captureCtr, capture.Value);Di2015NewLine    captureCtr++; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4651590Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport java.io.BufferedReader;Di2015NewLineimport java.io.IOException;Di2015NewLineimport java.io.InputStreamReader;Di2015NewLineimport java.util.ArrayList;Di2015NewLineimport java.util.List;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* VPW Template */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MainDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * @param argsDi2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOExceptionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new Main().start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void start() throws IOExceptionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Read the stuff */Di2015NewLine    BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));Di2015NewLine    String[] input = new String[Integer.parseInt(br.readLine())];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < input.length; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        input[i] = br.readLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /* Process each line */Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < input.length; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        processLine(input[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void processLine(String line)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int n = Integer.parseInt(line);Di2015NewLine    System.out.println(countPolyminos(n));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate int countPolyminos(int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    hashes.clear();Di2015NewLine    count = 0;Di2015NewLine    boolean[][] matrix = new boolean[n][n];Di2015NewLine    matrix[n / 2][n / 2] = true;Di2015NewLine    createPolyominos(matrix, n - 1);Di2015NewLine    return count;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate List<BigInteger> hashes = new ArrayList<BigInteger>();Di2015NewLineprivate int count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void createPolyominos(boolean[][] matrix, int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        boolean[][] cropped = cropMatrix(matrix);Di2015NewLine        BigInteger hash = hashMatrixOrientationIndependent(cropped);Di2015NewLine        if (!hashes.contains(hash))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // System.out.println(count + " Found!");Di2015NewLine            // printMatrix(cropped);Di2015NewLine            // System.out.println();Di2015NewLine            count++;Di2015NewLine            hashes.add(hash);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    for (int x = 0; x < matrix.length; ++x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < matrix[x].length; ++y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (matrix[x][y])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (x > 0 && !matrix[x - 1][y])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    boolean[][] clone = copy(matrix);Di2015NewLine                    clone[x - 1][y] = true;Di2015NewLine                    createPolyominos(clone, n - 1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (x < matrix.length - 1 && !matrix[x + 1][y])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    boolean[][] clone = copy(matrix);Di2015NewLine                    clone[x + 1][y] = true;Di2015NewLine                    createPolyominos(clone, n - 1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (y > 0 && !matrix[x][y - 1])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    boolean[][] clone = copy(matrix);Di2015NewLine                    clone[x][y - 1] = true;Di2015NewLine                    createPolyominos(clone, n - 1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (y < matrix[x].length - 1 && !matrix[x][y + 1])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    boolean[][] clone = copy(matrix);Di2015NewLine                    clone[x][y + 1] = true;Di2015NewLine                    createPolyominos(clone, n - 1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic boolean[][] copy(boolean[][] matrix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    boolean[][] b = new boolean[matrix.length][matrix[0].length];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < matrix.length; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.arraycopy(matrix[i], 0, b[i], 0, matrix[i].length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return b;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void printMatrix(boolean[][] matrix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < matrix.length; ++y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < matrix[y].length; ++x)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.out.print((matrix[y][x] ? 'X' : ' '));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        System.out.println();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic boolean[][] cropMatrix(boolean[][] matrix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int l = 0, t = 0, r = 0, b = 0;Di2015NewLine    // LeftDi2015NewLine    left: for (int x = 0; x < matrix.length; ++x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < matrix[x].length; ++y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (matrix[x][y])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break left;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        l++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // RightDi2015NewLine    right: for (int x = matrix.length - 1; x >= 0; --x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < matrix[x].length; ++y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (matrix[x][y])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break right;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        r++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // TopDi2015NewLine    top: for (int y = 0; y < matrix[0].length; ++y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < matrix.length; ++x)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (matrix[x][y])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break top;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        t++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // BottomDi2015NewLine    bottom: for (int y = matrix[0].length - 1; y >= 0; --y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < matrix.length; ++x)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (matrix[x][y])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break bottom;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        b++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Perform the real cropDi2015NewLine    boolean[][] cropped = new boolean[matrix.length - l - r][matrix[0].length - t - b];Di2015NewLine    for (int x = l; x < matrix.length - r; ++x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.arraycopy(matrix[x], t, cropped[x - l], 0, matrix[x].length - t - b);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return cropped;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic BigInteger hashMatrix(boolean[][] matrix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageDigest md = MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-256");Di2015NewLine        md.update((byte) matrix.length);Di2015NewLine        md.update((byte) matrix[0].length);Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < matrix.length; ++x)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int y = 0; y < matrix[x].length; ++y)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (matrix[x][y])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    md.update((byte) x);Di2015NewLine                } elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    md.update((byte) y);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new BigInteger(1, md.digest());Di2015NewLine    } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.exit(1);Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic BigInteger hashMatrixOrientationIndependent(boolean[][] matrix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    BigInteger hash = hashMatrix(matrix);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        matrix = rotateMatrixLeft(matrix);Di2015NewLine        hash = hash.add(hashMatrix(matrix));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return hash;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic boolean[][] rotateMatrixRight(boolean[][] matrix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /* W and H are already swapped */Di2015NewLine    int w = matrix.length;Di2015NewLine    int h = matrix[0].length;Di2015NewLine    boolean[][] ret = new boolean[h][w];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < h; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < w; ++j)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ret[i][j] = matrix[w - j - 1][i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic boolean[][] rotateMatrixLeft(boolean[][] matrix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /* W and H are already swapped */Di2015NewLine    int w = matrix.length;Di2015NewLine    int h = matrix[0].length;Di2015NewLine    boolean[][] ret = new boolean[h][w];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < h; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < w; ++j)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ret[i][j] = matrix[j][h - i - 1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4653400Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Application_Start() {Di2015NewLine  _parentContainer = new UnityContainer();Di2015NewLine   //creates a transient registration, available at any point in the app.Di2015NewLine  _parentContainer.RegisterType<IParentIntf, ParentIntfImpl>();Di2015NewLine  ControllerBuilder.Current.SetControllerFactory(new ServiceLocatorControllerFactory());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Application_BeginRequest() {Di2015NewLine  var childContainer = _parentContainer.CreateChildContainer();Di2015NewLine  //registers a request "singleton"Di2015NewLine  //This registration is a type registration, an instance of RequestInterfaceImplDi2015NewLine  //will be created when needed and then kept in the container for later use.Di2015NewLine  childContainer.RegisterType<IRequestInterface,RequestInterfaceImpl>(new ContainerControlledLifetimeManager());Di2015NewLine  //save the child container in the context, so we can use it laterDi2015NewLine  HttpContext.Items["childContainer"] = childContainer;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Application_EndRequest() {Di2015NewLine  //dispose the child containerDi2015NewLine  ((IUnityContainer)HttpContext.Items["childContainer"]).Dispose();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4653400Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UnityControllerFactory : DefaultControllerFactory {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region IControllerFactory MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override IController CreateController(System.Web.Routing.RequestContext requestContext, string controllerName) {Di2015NewLine        IController controller;Di2015NewLine        controllerName = controllerName.ToLower();Di2015NewLine        var container = ((IUnityContainer)HttpContext.Items["childContainer"])Di2015NewLine        if(container.IsRegistered<IController>(controllerName))Di2015NewLine            controller = container.Resolve<IController>(controllerName);Di2015NewLine        else Di2015NewLine            controller = base.CreateController(requestContext, controllerName) ;Di2015NewLine        return controller;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

4655469Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ListItem : IComparable<ListItem>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int RollNumber { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string AdmissionCode { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly char[] Numbers = new[]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        '0',Di2015NewLine        '1',Di2015NewLine        '2',Di2015NewLine        '3',Di2015NewLine        '4',Di2015NewLine        '5',Di2015NewLine        '6',Di2015NewLine        '7',Di2015NewLine        '8',Di2015NewLine        '9'Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Implementation of IComparable<in ListItem>Di2015NewLine    public int CompareTo(ListItem other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Assumes AdmissionCode is in ####ABC format,Di2015NewLine        // with at least one number and any amount of letters.Di2015NewLine        string myNumberPart, myRemainingPart;Di2015NewLine        string otherNumberPart, otherRemainingPart;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SplitAdmissionCode(AdmissionCode, out myNumberPart, out myRemainingPart);Di2015NewLine        SplitAdmissionCode(other.AdmissionCode, out otherNumberPart, out otherRemainingPart);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int myNumber = int.Parse(myNumberPart);Di2015NewLine        int otherNumber = int.Parse(otherNumberPart);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int result = myNumber.CompareTo(otherNumber);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Numbers are different.Di2015NewLine        if (result != 0)Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Numbers are same. 4656800Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class SelectExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GetInputName<TModel, TProperty>(Expression<Func<TModel, TProperty>> expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (expression.Body.NodeType == ExpressionType.Call)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MethodCallExpression methodCallExpression = (MethodCallExpression)expression.Body;Di2015NewLine            string name = GetInputName(methodCallExpression);Di2015NewLine            return name.Substring(expression.Parameters[0].Name.Length + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return expression.Body.ToString().Substring(expression.Parameters[0].Name.Length + 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetInputName(MethodCallExpression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // p => p.Foo.Bar().Baz.ToString() => p.Foo OR throw...Di2015NewLine        MethodCallExpression methodCallExpression = expression.Object as MethodCallExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (methodCallExpression != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return GetInputName(methodCallExpression);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return expression.Object.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static MvcHtmlString EnumDropDownListFor<TModel, TProperty>(this HtmlHelper<TModel> htmlHelper, Expression<Func<TModel, TProperty>> expression) where TModel : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string inputName = GetInputName(expression);Di2015NewLine        var value = htmlHelper.ViewData.Model == nullDi2015NewLine            ? default(TProperty)Di2015NewLine            : expression.Compile()(htmlHelper.ViewData.Model);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return htmlHelper.DropDownList(inputName, ToSelectList(typeof(TProperty), value.ToString()));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static SelectList ToSelectList(Type enumType, string selectedItem)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<SelectListItem> items = new List<SelectListItem>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in Enum.GetValues(enumType))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FieldInfo fi = enumType.GetField(item.ToString());Di2015NewLine            var attribute = fi.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DescriptionAttribute), true).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine            var title = attribute == null ? item.ToString() : ((DescriptionAttribute)attribute).Description;Di2015NewLine            var listItem = new SelectListItemDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Value = ((int)item).ToString(),Di2015NewLine                    Text = title,Di2015NewLine                    Selected = selectedItem == ((int)item).ToString()Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine            items.Add(listItem);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new SelectList(items, "Value", "Text", selectedItem);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4658567Di2015UniqueSeparatorint FindIndexOfSeq<T>(byte[] src, byte[] tag)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Int32 tagCount = tag.Count();            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If `tag` is not empty and `src` contains `tag`Di2015NewLine    if (tagCount > 0 && src.Intersect(tag).Count() == tagCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Find index of first element in `tag`Di2015NewLine        Int32 tagStartIndex = Array.IndexOf(src, tag.First());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the matching slice of `tag` from `src`Di2015NewLine        var newSrc = src.Skip(tagStartIndex).Take(tag.Count()).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Zip them together using their differenceDi2015NewLine        var sum = Enumerable.Zip(tag, newSrc, (i1, i2) => Convert.ToInt32(i2 - i1)).Sum();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If total of their differences is zero, both sequences matchDi2015NewLine        if (sum == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // return starting index of `tag` in `src`Di2015NewLine            return tagStartIndex;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // return `Not Found`Di2015NewLine    return -1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4658936Di2015UniqueSeparator// Let's assume you'll never really need more than thisDi2015NewLineprivate static readonly byte[] LargeJunkArray = new byte[1024 * 32];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static bool SecureEquals(byte[] original, byte[] potential)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Reveal that the original array will never be more than 32K.Di2015NewLine    // This is unlikely to be particularly useful.Di2015NewLine    if (potential.Length > LargeJunkArray.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    byte[] copy = new byte[potential.Length];Di2015NewLine    int bytesFromOriginal = Math.Min(original.Length, copy.Length);Di2015NewLine    // Always copy the same amount of dataDi2015NewLine    Array.Copy(original, 0, copy, 0, bytesFromOriginal);Di2015NewLine    Array.Copy(LargeJunkArray, 0, copy, bytesFromOriginal,Di2015NewLine               copy.Length - bytesFromOriginal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool isEqual = original.Length == potential.Length;Di2015NewLine    for(int i=0; i < copy.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        isEqual = isEqual & (copy[i] == potential[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return isEqual;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4667352Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetUniqueId<T, TProperty>(this IQueryable<T> source, int length, Expression<Func<T, TProperty>> idProperty)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool isUnique = false;Di2015NewLine        string uniqueId = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine        while (!isUnique)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            uniqueId = PasswordGenerator.GenerateNoSpecialCharacters(length);Di2015NewLine            if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(uniqueId))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var expr = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Call(idProperty.Body, typeof(string).GetMethod("Equals", new[] { typeof(string) }), Expression.Constant(uniqueId)), idProperty.Parameters);Di2015NewLine                isUnique = source.SingleOrDefault(expr) == null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return uniqueId;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

4670316Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<string,string> ArrayToDict(string[] arr)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(arr.Length%2!=0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Array doesn't contain an even number of entries");Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<string,string> dict=new Dictionary<string,string>();Di2015NewLine    for(int i=0;i<arr.Length/2;i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      string key=arr[2*i];Di2015NewLine      string value=arr[2*i+1];Di2015NewLine      dict.Add(key,value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return dict;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4670438Di2015UniqueSeparatorcreate table #Temp (Name varchar(100), [Count] int)Di2015NewLineinsert into #Temp (Name, [Count]) VALUES ('Kaganoff Benzion', 122)Di2015NewLineinsert into #Temp (Name, [Count]) VALUES ('Van Gennep', 443)Di2015NewLineinsert into #Temp (Name, [Count]) VALUES ('Michelen Luis', 656)Di2015NewLineinsert into #Temp (Name, [Count]) VALUES ('kraig Beno', 333)Di2015NewLineinsert into #Temp (Name, [Count]) VALUES ('Mogrobejo Endika', 555)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineselectDi2015NewLineSUBSTRING(Name, 1, PATINDEX('% %', Name)) AS FirstName,Di2015NewLineSUBSTRING(Name, PATINDEX('% %', Name) + 1, LEN(Name) - PATINDEX('% %', Name)) AS SecondName,Di2015NewLine[Count]Di2015NewLinefrom #TempDi2015NewLineORDER BY SUBSTRING(Name, 1, 1), SUBSTRING(Name, PATINDEX('% %', Name) + 1, 1), [Count] DESCDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedrop table #TempDi2015NewLine

4671179Di2015UniqueSeparator// 100 passes on a int[1000][1000] set sizeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// 701% faster than original (14.26%)Di2015NewLinestatic int[][] CopyArrayLinq(int[][] source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return source.Select(s => s.ToArray()).ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// 752% faster than original (13.38%)Di2015NewLinestatic int[][] CopyArrayBuiltIn(int[][] source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var len = source.Length;Di2015NewLine    var dest = new int[len][];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var x = 0; x < len; x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var inner = source[x];Di2015NewLine        var ilen = inner.Length;Di2015NewLine        var newer = new int[ilen];Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(inner, newer, ilen);Di2015NewLine        dest[x] = newer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return dest;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4679184Di2015UniqueSeparator[TypeConverter(typeof(CompactButtonTypeConverter))]Di2015NewLinepublic class CompactButton: ... {Di2015NewLine  ...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CompactButtonTypeConverter: TypeConverter {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override bool CanConvertTo(ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type destinationType) {Di2015NewLine    if (destinationType == typeof(InstanceDescriptor)) Di2015NewLine       return true;Di2015NewLine    return base.CanConvertTo(context, destinationType);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override object ConvertTo(ITypeDescriptorContext context, CultureInfo culture, object value, Type destinationType) {Di2015NewLine    if (destinationType == typeof(InstanceDescriptor) && value is CompactButton) {Di2015NewLine      // This assumes you have a public default constructor on your type.Di2015NewLine      ConstructorInfo ctor = typeof(CompactButton).GetConstructor();Di2015NewLine      if (ctor != null) Di2015NewLine         return new InstanceDescriptor(ctor, new object[0], false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return base.ConvertTo(context, culture, value, destinationType);      Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4681120Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IUniqueable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Expression<Func<T, bool>> Unique { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Base, IUniqueable<Base>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  ...Di2015NewLine  public Expression<Func<Base, bool>> UniqueDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var xParam = Expression.Parameter(typeof(Base), typeof(Base).Name);Di2015NewLine      MemberExpression leftExprFieldCheck = MemberExpression.Property(xParam, "Name");Di2015NewLine      Expression return Expression.Lambda<Func<Base, bool>>(binaryExprFieldCheck, new ParameterExpression[] { xParam });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  ...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Account : Base, IUniqueable<Account>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  ...Di2015NewLine  public new Expression<Func<Account, bool>> leftExprNameCheck = MemberExpression.Property(xParam, "Name");Di2015NewLine      Expression rightExprNameCheck = Expression.Constant(this.Name);Di2015NewLine      BinaryExpression binaryExprNameCheck = MemberExpression.Equal(leftExprNameCheck, rightExprNameCheck);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      MemberExpression leftExprFieldCheck = MemberExpression.Property(xParam, "AccountCode");Di2015NewLine      Expression rightExprFieldCheck = Expression.Constant(this.AccountCode);Di2015NewLine      BinaryExpression binaryExprFieldCheck = MemberExpression.Equal(leftExprFieldCheck, rightExprFieldCheck);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      BinaryExpression binaryExprAllCheck = Expression.OrElse(binaryExprNameCheck, binaryExprFieldCheck);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return Expression.Lambda<Func<Account, bool>>(binaryExprAllCheck, new ParameterExpression[] { xParam });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  ...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic 4682031Di2015UniqueSeparator// store ns in a local variable as it is going to be re-usedDi2015NewLineconst string HTML_NS = "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40";Di2015NewLineconst string EXCEL_NS = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:excel";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineXmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine// create the HTML element and set the HTML namespace as the defaultDi2015NewLineXmlElement htmlElement = doc.CreateElement("html", HTML_NS);Di2015NewLine// add the office/excel namespaces into the HTML element (so we can reference them later)Di2015NewLinehtmlElement.SetAttribute("xmlns:o", "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office");Di2015NewLinehtmlElement.SetAttribute("xmlns:x", EXCEL_NS);Di2015NewLinedoc.AppendChild(htmlElement);Di2015NewLine// associate the HEAD element with the HTML namespace as this is a HTML elementDi2015NewLineXmlElement headElement = doc.CreateElement("head", HTML_NS);    Di2015NewLinehtmlElement.AppendChild(headElement);Di2015NewLine// now this is the one I am not too sure about as I don't know which Di2015NewLine// namespace you would associate the XML tag with. If you run the code Di2015NewLine// as it is specified here it will write out as <xml xmlns=""> which isDi2015NewLine// correct as we aren't associating it with a namespace. As a workaround Di2015NewLine// you could associate it with the HTML NS if it is just for writing out Di2015NewLineXmlElement xmlElement = doc.CreateElement("xml", HTML_NS);   Di2015NewLineheadElement.AppendChild(xmlElement);Di2015NewLine// create ExcelWorkbook element and associate with the excel namespaceDi2015NewLine// Unlike the HTML/HEAD tags we need to supply the prefix here because the ExcelDi2015NewLine// namespace is not the defaultDi2015NewLineXmlElement xlWorkbookElement = doc.CreateElement("x", "ExcelWorkbook", EXCEL_NS);Di2015NewLinexmlElement.AppendChild(xlWorkbookElement);Di2015NewLine// create ExcelWorksheets element and associate with the excel namespaceDi2015NewLineXmlElement xlWorksheetsElement = doc.CreateElement("x", "ExcelWorksheets", EXCEL_NS);Di2015NewLinexlWorkbookElement.AppendChild(xlWorksheetsElement);Di2015NewLine// create the ExcelWorksheet element and associate with the excel namespaceDi2015NewLineXmlElement xlWorksheetElement = doc.CreateElement("x", "ExcelWorksheet", EXCEL_NS);Di2015NewLinexlWorksheetsElement.AppendChild(xlWorksheetElement);Di2015NewLine

4682163Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class LinqExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> GroupAdjacentBy<T>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, T, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var e = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (e.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var list = new List<T> { e.Current };Di2015NewLine                var pred = e.Current;Di2015NewLine                while (e.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (predicate(pred, e.Current))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        list.Add(e.Current);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        yield return list;Di2015NewLine                        list = new List<T> { e.Current };Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    pred = e.Current;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                yield return list;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4685745Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class CsvDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string Escape( string s )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ( s.Contains( QUOTE ) )Di2015NewLine            s = s.Replace( QUOTE, ESCAPED_QUOTE );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ( s.IndexOfAny( CHARACTERS_THAT_MUST_BE_QUOTED ) > -1 )Di2015NewLine            s = QUOTE + s + QUOTE;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return s;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string Unescape( string s )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ( s.StartsWith( QUOTE ) && s.EndsWith( QUOTE ) )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            s = s.Substring( 1, s.Length - 2 );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ( s.Contains( ESCAPED_QUOTE ) )Di2015NewLine                s = s.Replace( ESCAPED_QUOTE, QUOTE );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return s;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const string QUOTE = "\\"";Di2015NewLine    private const string ESCAPED_QUOTE = "\\"\\"";Di2015NewLine    private static char[] CHARACTERS_THAT_MUST_BE_QUOTED = { ',', '"', '\\n' };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4688811Di2015UniqueSeparator(       # Match and capture the following:Di2015NewLine \\b     # Assert that the match starts at a "word boundary"Di2015NewLine \\d+    # Match one or more digitsDi2015NewLine \\.     # Match a .Di2015NewLine \\d{2}  # Match exactly two digitsDi2015NewLine \\b     # Assert that the number ends hereDi2015NewLine)       # End of first capturing groupDi2015NewLine.*?     # Match any number of intervening characters; as few as possibleDi2015NewLine(       # Match and capture...Di2015NewLine \\b     # Word boundaryDi2015NewLine \\d{11} # Exactly 11 digitsDi2015NewLine \\b     # Word boundaryDi2015NewLine)       # End of matchDi2015NewLine

4689009Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing(TransactionScope ts = new TransactionScope())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  //all db code hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // if error occurs jump out of the using block and it will dispose and rollbackDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  ts.Complete();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4689009Di2015UniqueSeparator    // Create the TransactionScope to execute the commands, guaranteeingDi2015NewLine    // that both commands can commit or roll back as a single unit of work.Di2015NewLine    using (TransactionScope scope = new TransactionScope())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (SqlConnection connection1 = new SqlConnection(connectString1))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Opening the connection automatically enlists it in the Di2015NewLine                // TransactionScope as a lightweight transaction.Di2015NewLine                connection1.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Create the SqlCommand object and execute the first command.Di2015NewLine                SqlCommand command1 = new SqlCommand(commandText1, connection1);Di2015NewLine                returnValue = command1.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine("Rows to be affected by command1: {0}", returnValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If you get here, this means that command1 succeeded. By nestingDi2015NewLine                // the using block for connection2 inside that of connection1, youDi2015NewLine                // conserve server and network resources as connection2 is openedDi2015NewLine                // only when there is a chance that the transaction can commit.   Di2015NewLine                using (SqlConnection connection2 = new SqlConnection(connectString2))Di2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // The transaction is escalated to a full distributedDi2015NewLine                        // transaction when connection2 is opened.Di2015NewLine                        connection2.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Execute the second command in the second database.Di2015NewLine                        returnValue = 0;Di2015NewLine                        SqlCommand command2 = new SqlCommand(commandText2, connection2);Di2015NewLine                        returnValue = command2.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine                        writer.WriteLine("Rows to be affected by command2: {0}", returnValue);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Display information that command2 failed.Di2015NewLine                        writer.WriteLine("returnValue for command2: {0}", returnValue);Di2015NewLine                        writer.WriteLine("Exception Message2: {0}", ex.Message);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Display information that command1 failed.Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine("returnValue for command1: {0}", returnValue);Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine("Exception Message1: {0}", ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The Complete method commits the transaction. If an exception has been thrown,Di2015NewLine        // Complete is not  called and the transaction is rolled back.Di2015NewLine        scope.Complete();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

4691582Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<string> pro_hook = list_all_processes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected static List<string> list_all_processes()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var list = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Process i in Process.GetProcesses(".")) {Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            foreach (ProcessModule pm in i.Modules) {Di2015NewLine                list.Add(pm.FileName);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } catch { }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return list;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4691629Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool Compare(Type type, string[] propertyNames, object[] oldState, object[] state) {Di2015NewLine    // Get the property indexes to ignoreDi2015NewLine    var propertyIndexesToIgnore = type.GetProperties()Di2015NewLine        .Where(p => p.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(IgnoreLoggingAttribute), false).Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine        .Select(p => Array.IndexOf(propertyNames, p.Name)).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the child property indexesDi2015NewLine    var childPropertyIndexes = type.GetProperties()Di2015NewLine        .Where(p => p.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(ChildLoggingAttribute), false).Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine        .Select(p => Array.IndexOf(propertyNames, p.Name)).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < oldState.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine        // If we need to check the child propertiesDi2015NewLine        if (childPropertyIndexes.Contains(i)) {Di2015NewLine            if (oldState[i] == null)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var childPropertyType = oldState[i].GetType();Di2015NewLine            var childProperties = oldState[i].GetType().GetProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Recursively call this function to check the child propertiesDi2015NewLine            if (Compare(childPropertyType, childProperties.Select(p => p.Name).ToArray(), childProperties.Select(p => p.GetValue(oldState[i], null)).ToArray<object>(), childProperties.Select(p => p.GetValue(state[i], null)).ToArray<object>()))Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine        } else if (!propertyIndexesToIgnore.Contains(i) && ((oldState[i] != null && state[i] != null && !oldState[i].Equals(state[i])) || (oldState[i] != null && state[i] == null) || (oldState[i] == null && state[i] != null)))Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4693174Di2015UniqueSeparator// C#Di2015NewLine// Outlook 2007Di2015NewLine// PropertyAccessor usage sample for MailItem.Attachments[n]Di2015NewLine////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine// For all those MAPI tags related to an Outlook Mailitem, they're all on the link:Di2015NewLine//ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/mapi/html/af87aa9c-02f9-4b2c-9c7b-0fa1ea27af02.htmDi2015NewLine// go there, then synch the index to see the full list at your disposalDi2015NewLine// if you have the Outlook developer's reference loaded.Di2015NewLine//Di2015NewLine// of note for attachments:Di2015NewLine//Di2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_ADDITIONAL_INFO     0x370F0102 Di2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_CONTENT_BASE        0x3711001E (0x3711001F for Unicode) Di2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_CONTENT_ID          0x3712001E (0x3712001F for Unicode) Di2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_CONTENT_LOCATION    0x3713001E (0x3713001F for Unicode) Di2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_DATA_BIN            0x37010102 The PR_ATTACH_DATA_BIN property holds the attachment when the value of the PR_ATTACH_METHOD property is ATTACH_BY_VALUE, which is the usual attachment method and the only one required to be supported.Di2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_DATA_OBJ            0x3701000D The PR_ATTACH_DATA_OBJ property holds the attachment when the value of the PR_ATTACH_METHOD property is ATTACH_EMBEDDED_MSG Di2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_ENCODING            0x37020102 identifies the algorithm used to transform the data in an attachment. (see PR_ATTACH_TAGDi2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_EXTENSION           0x3703001E (0x3703001F for Unicode) The receiving client should first check for PR_ATTACH_EXTENSION, and if it is not provided, should parse the filename extension from the attachment's PR_ATTACH_FILENAME or PR_ATTACH_LONG_FILENAME property.Di2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_FILENAME            0x3704001E (0x3704001F for Unicode) 8.3 namingDi2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_FLAGS               0x37140003 PT_LONG ATT_INVISIBLE_IN_HTML |ATT_INVISIBLE_IN_RTF Di2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_LONG_FILENAME       0x3707001E (0x3707001F for Unicode)  Platforms that support long filenames should set both the PR_ATTACH_LONG_FILENAME and PR_ATTACH_FILENAME properties when sending, and should check PR_ATTACH_LONG_FILENAME first when receiving. Di2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_LONG_PATHNAME       0x370D001E (0x370D001F for Unicode)Di2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_METHOD              0x37050003 PT_LONG Di2015NewLine//      NO_ATTACHMENT           - When created, all attachment objects have an initial PR_ATTACH_METHOD value of NO_ATTACHMENTDi2015NewLine//      ATTACH_BY_VALUE         - PR_ATTACH_DATA_BIN contains attachment dataDi2015NewLine//      ATTACH_BY_REFERENCE     - common path accessible by sender & recipient (common file server) via PR_ATTACH_PATHNAME or PR_ATTACH_LONG_PATHNAMEDi2015NewLine//      ATTACH_BY_REF_RESOLVE   - full path)Di2015NewLine//      ATTACH_BY_REF_ONLY      -  Di2015NewLine//      ATTACH_EMBEDDED_MSG     - PR_ATTACH_DATA_OBJ contains the object that supports IMessage interfaceDi2015NewLine//      ATTACH_OLE  Di2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_MIME_SEQUENCE       0x37100003 PT_LONGDi2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_MIME_TAG            0x370E001E (0x370E001F for Unicode) Di2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_NUM                 0x0E210003 PT_LONGDi2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_PATHNAME            0x3708001E (0x3708001F for Unicode) 8.3 and limit of 256 characters totalDi2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_RENDERING           0x37090102 PT_BINARY For an attached file, PR_ATTACH_RENDERING usually portrays an icon for the file. Di2015NewLine//                              - but see ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/mapi/html/be29f536-a402-4e5e-b06d-9a7af587d719.htmDi2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_SIZE                0x0E200003 PT_LONGDi2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_TAG                 0x370A0102 identifies the application that originally generated the attachmentDi2015NewLine//PR_ATTACH_TRANSPORT_NAME      0x370C001E (0x370C001F for Unicode) used by TNEF and proansport provider -  It is usually not available to client applications. Di2015NewLine//PR_ATTACHMENT_X400_PARAMETERS 0x37000102 UNSUPPORTED, DO NOT USEDi2015NewLine//Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// assume you have an Outlook.MailItem:Di2015NewLine// also assume that you're working on attachment # 'x' Di2015NewLine// btw for newbies, attachmentDi2015NewLine// set up the schema pathsDi2015NewLinestring SchemaPR_ATTACH_METHOD = @"http://schemas.microsoft.com/mapi/proptag/0x37050003";Di2015NewLinestring SchemaPR_ATTACH_CONTENT_ID = @"http://schemas.microsoft.com/mapi/proptag/0x3712001E";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineOutlook.PropertyAccessor oPA = mailItem.Attachments[x].PropertyAccessor;Di2015NewLinestring AttachMethod = (string)oPA.GetProperty(SchemaPR_ATTACH_METHOD);Di2015NewLinestring AttachCID = (string)oPA.GetProperty(SchemaPR_ATTACH_CONTENT_ID);Di2015NewLine

4696914Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Splits a collection into chunks of equal size. The last chunk may be smaller than chunkSize, but all chunks, if any, will contain at least one element.</summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Chunk<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, int chunkSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (chunkSize <= 0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("chunkSize must be greater than zero.", "chunkSize");Di2015NewLine    return chunkIterator(source, chunkSize);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> chunkIterator<T>(IEnumerable<T> source, int chunkSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var list = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var elem in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        list.Add(elem);Di2015NewLine        if (list.Count == chunkSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return list;Di2015NewLine            list = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (list.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        yield return list;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4698953Di2015UniqueSeparator// the queue of rows that need to be deleted:Di2015NewLinevar rowsToDelete = new List<DataGridViewRow>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// fill the queue:Di2015NewLineforeach (var row in dataGridView.Rows)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (removeCriteriaMetBy(row) == true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        rowsToDelete.Add(row);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// work off the queue:Di2015NewLinevar queueWorker = new BackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLinequeueWorker.DoWork += (sender, e) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var row in rowsToDelete)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // sleep per item:Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(900);Di2015NewLine            // call back on the UI thread in order to modify the GUI control:Di2015NewLine            dataGridView.Invoke(new Action( () =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dataGridView.Rows.Remove(row);Di2015NewLine                }));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLinequeueWorker.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLine

4703403Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Point MovePointTowards(Point a, Point b, double distance)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var vector = new Point(b.X - a.X, b.Y - a.Y);Di2015NewLine    var length = Math.Sqrt(vector.X * vector.X + vector.Y * vector.Y);Di2015NewLine    var unitVector = new Point(vector.X / length, vector.Y / length);Di2015NewLine    return new Point(a.X + unitVector.X * distance, a.X + unitVector.Y * distance);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4707798Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override void OnTextChanged(TextChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   base.OnTextChanged(e);Di2015NewLine   // if we're already cancelling a search, there's nothing more to do untilDi2015NewLine   // the cancellation is complete.Di2015NewLine   if (Worker.CancellationPending)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   // if there's a search in progress, cancel it.Di2015NewLine   if (Worker.IsBusy)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      Worker.CancelAsync();Di2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   // there's no search in progress, so begin one using the current valueDi2015NewLine   // of the Text property.Di2015NewLine   Worker.RunWorkerAsync(Text);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4707798Di2015UniqueSeparatorWorker_RunWorkerCompleted
4707798Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Worker_RunWorkerCompleted(object sender, Di2015NewLine   RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // always check e.Error first, in case PerformSearch threw an exception.Di2015NewLine   if (e.Error != null)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      // in your version, you want to do real exception handling, not this.Di2015NewLine      throw e.Error.InnerException;  Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   // if the worker was cancelled, it's because the user typed some more text, andDi2015NewLine   // we want to launch a new search using what's currently in the Text property.Di2015NewLine   if (e.Cancelled)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      Worker.RunWorkerAsync(Text);Di2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   // if the worker wasn't cancelled, e.Result contains the results of the search.Di2015NewLine   DisplayResults((IEnumerable<string> e.Result);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4714107Di2015UniqueSeparator    static Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int vouchersToGenerate = 10;Di2015NewLine        int lengthOfVoucher = 10; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<string> generatedVouchers = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        char[] keys = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ01234567890".ToCharArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Vouchers: ");Di2015NewLine        while(generatedVouchers.Count < vouchersToGenerate)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var voucher = GenerateVoucher(keys, lengthOfVoucher); Di2015NewLine            if (!generatedVouchers.Contains(voucher))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                generatedVouchers.Add(voucher);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("\\t[#{0}] {1}", generatedVouchers.Count, voucher);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("done");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GenerateVoucher(char[] keys, int lengthOfVoucher)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return EnumerableDi2015NewLine            .Range(1, lengthOfVoucher) // for(i.. ) Di2015NewLine            .Select(k => keys[random.Next(0, keys.Length - 1)])  // generate a new random char Di2015NewLine            .Aggregate("", (e, c) => e + c); // join into a stringDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
