4718829Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Web.UI;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine... in your page class:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePageStatePersister pageStatePersister;Di2015NewLineprotected override PageStatePersister PageStatePersisterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  getDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Unlike as exemplified in the MSDN docs, we cannot simply return a new PageStatePersisterDi2015NewLine    // every call to this property, as it causes problemsDi2015NewLine    return pageStatePersister ?? (pageStatePersister = new BetterSessionPageStatePersister(this));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine... in your BetterSessionPageStatePersister.cs:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// This class allows the viewstate to be kept server-side, so that postbacks are as small as possible.Di2015NewLine/// It is similar to the built-in 'SessionPageStatePersister', but it yields smaller postbacks,Di2015NewLine/// because the SessionPageStatePersister still leaves some viewstate (possibly it leaves the controlstate)Di2015NewLine/// in the postback.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineclass BetterSessionPageStatePersister : PageStatePersisterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public BetterSessionPageStatePersister(Page page)Di2015NewLine    : base(page)Di2015NewLine  { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  const string ViewStateFieldName = "__VIEWSTATEKEY";Di2015NewLine  const string ViewStateKeyPrefix = "ViewState_";Di2015NewLine  const string RecentViewStateQueue = "ViewStateQueue";Di2015NewLine  const int RecentViewStateQueueMaxLength = 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override void Load()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // The cache key for this viewstate is stored in a hidden field, so grab itDi2015NewLine    string viewStateKey = Page.Request.Form[ViewStateFieldName] as string;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Grab the viewstate data using the key to look it upDi2015NewLine    if (viewStateKey != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Pair p = (Pair)Page.Session[viewStateKey];Di2015NewLine      ViewState = p.First;Di2015NewLine      ControlState = p.Second;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override void Save()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Give this viewstate a random keyDi2015NewLine    string viewStateKey = ViewStateKeyPrefix + Guid.NewGuid().ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Store the view and control stateDi2015NewLine    Page.Session[viewStateKey] = new Pair(ViewState, ControlState);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Store the viewstate's key in a hidden field, so on postback we can grab it from the cacheDi2015NewLine    Page.ClientScript.RegisterHiddenField(ViewStateFieldName, viewStateKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Some tidying up: keep track of the X most recent viewstates for this user, and remove old onesDi2015NewLine    var recent = Page.Session[RecentViewStateQueue] as Queue<string>;Di2015NewLine    if (recent == null) Page.Session[RecentViewStateQueue] = recent = new Queue<string>();Di2015NewLine    recent.Enqueue(viewStateKey); // Add this new one so it'll get removed laterDi2015NewLine    while (recent.Count > RecentViewStateQueueMaxLength) // If we've got lots in the queue, remove the old onesDi2015NewLine      Page.Session.Remove(recent.Dequeue());Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4718849Di2015UniqueSeparator    PageStatePersister pageStatePersister;Di2015NewLine    protected override PageStatePersister PageStatePersisterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Unlike as exemplified in the MSDN docs, we cannot simply return a new PageStatePersisterDi2015NewLine            // every call to this property, as it causes problemsDi2015NewLine            return pageStatePersister ?? (pageStatePersister = new SessionPageStatePersister(this));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

4723461Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string[] ExtractURLs(string str)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // match.Groups["name"].Value - URL NameDi2015NewLine    // match.Groups["url"].Value - URIDi2015NewLine    string RegexPattern = @"<a.*?href=[""'](?<url>.*?)[""'].*?>(?<name>.*?)</a>"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Find matches.Di2015NewLine    System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection matchesDi2015NewLine        = System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches(str, RegexPattern, System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string[] MatchList = new string[matches.Count];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Report on each match.Di2015NewLine    int c = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match match in matches)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MatchList[c] = match.Groups["url"].Value;Di2015NewLine        c++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return MatchList;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

next download)Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    protected Int64 ContentLength = default(Int64);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The file we're SegmentedDownloader(Uri URL)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.FileLocation = URL;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Grab the latests details from the pageDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Stream with the changes</returns>Di2015NewLine    public Stream GetLatest()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stream result = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest webRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(this.FileLocation);Di2015NewLine            if (this.ContentLength > 0)Di2015NewLine                webRequest.AddRange(this.ContentLength);Di2015NewLine (contentLength > 0 || lastModifiedSince.CompareTo(this.LastModifiedSince) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result = webResponse.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine (System.Net.WebException wex)Di2015NewLine        //{ // 302 = unchangedDi2015NewLine        //    Console.WriteLine("Unchanged");Di2015NewLine        //}Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4725644Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static TimeSpan updateInterval = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5);Di2015NewLine    static Thread tWorker;Di2015NewLine    static ManualResetEvent tReset;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tReset = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine        tWorker = new Thread(new ThreadStart(PollForUpdates));Di2015NewLine        tWorker.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Title = "Press ENTER to stop";Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tReset.Set();Di2015NewLine        tWorker.Join();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void PollForUpdates()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SegmentedDownloader segDL = new SegmentedDownloader("http://localhost/dataFile.txt");Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Stream fileData = segDL.GetLatest();Di2015NewLine            if (fileData != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (StreamReader fileReader = new StreamReader(fileData))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (fileReader.Peek() > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        doDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine(fileReader.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        while (!fileReader.EndOfStream);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (!tReset.WaitOne(updateInterval));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4727312Di2015UniqueSeparatorDECLAREDi2015NewLinet_blob BLOB;Di2015NewLinet_len NUMBER;Di2015NewLinet_file_name VARCHAR2(100);Di2015NewLinet_output UTL_FILE.file_type;Di2015NewLinet_TotalSize number;Di2015NewLinet_position number := 1;Di2015NewLinet_chucklen NUMBER := 4096;Di2015NewLinet_chuck raw(4096);Di2015NewLinet_remain number;Di2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine-- Get length of blobDi2015NewLineSELECT DBMS_LOB.getlength (PHOTO), ename || '_1.jpg'Di2015NewLineINTO t_TotalSize, t_file_name FROM DEMO WHERE ENAME ='moon';Di2015NewLinet_remain := t_TotalSize;Di2015NewLine-- The directory TEMPDIR should exist before executing Di2015NewLinet_output := UTL_FILE.fopen ('TEMPDIR', t_file_name, 'wb', 32760);Di2015NewLine-- Get BLOB Di2015NewLineSELECT PHOTO INTO t_blob FROM DEMO WHERE ENAME ='moon';Di2015NewLine-- Retrieving BLOBDi2015NewLineWHILE t_position < t_TotalSize Di2015NewLineLOOPDi2015NewLineDBMS_LOB.READ (t_blob, t_chucklen, t_position, t_chuck);Di2015NewLineUTL_FILE.put_raw (t_output, t_chuck);Di2015NewLineUTL_FILE.fflush (t_output);Di2015NewLinet_position := t_position + t_chucklen;Di2015NewLinet_remain := t_remain - t_chucklen;Di2015NewLineIF t_remain < 4096Di2015NewLineTHENDi2015NewLinet_chucklen := t_remain;Di2015NewLineEND IF;Di2015NewLineEND LOOP;Di2015NewLineEND;Di2015NewLine

4737336Di2015UniqueSeparator    // GDI+ has problems with lots of image formats, and it also chokes on unknown ones (like CMYK).Di2015NewLine// Therefore, we're going to take a whitelist approach.Di2015NewLine// see http://bmpinroad.blogspot.com/2006/04/file-formats-pixel-formats.htmlDi2015NewLine// also see http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/winforms/thread/c626a478-e5ef-4a5e-9a73-599b3b7a6eccDi2015NewLinePixelFormat format = originalImage.PixelFormat;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (format == PixelFormat.Format16bppArgb1555 ||Di2015NewLine    format == PixelFormat.Format64bppArgb)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // try to preserve transparencyDi2015NewLine    format = PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelse if (format == PixelFormat.Format64bppPArgb)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // try to preserve pre-multiplied transparencyDi2015NewLine    format = PixelFormat.Format32bppPArgb;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelse if (format != PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb && format != PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    format = PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// GIF saving is probably still an issue.  If we ever need to tackle it, see the following:Di2015NewLine// http://support.microsoft.com/kb/319061Di2015NewLine// http://www.bobpowell.net/giftransparency.htmDi2015NewLine// http://support.microsoft.com/kb/318343Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (Bitmap newImage = new Bitmap(newSize.Width, newSize.Height, format))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (Graphics Canvas = Graphics.FromImage(newImage))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (ImageAttributes attr = new ImageAttributes())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            attr.SetWrapMode(WrapMode.TileFlipXY);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Canvas.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.AntiAlias;Di2015NewLine            Canvas.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLine            Canvas.PixelOffsetMode = PixelOffsetMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine            Canvas.DrawImage(originalImage, new Rectangle(new Point(0, 0), newSize), srcRect.X, srcRect.Y, srcRect.Width, srcRect.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel, attr);Di2015NewLine            newImage.Save(outputImageStream, originalImage.RawFormat);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4740953Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ShapeDrawInstructionsRegistryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<Type, IDrawInstructions> _registry = new Dictionary<Type, IDrawInstructions>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Register<T>(IDrawInstructions instructions) where T: ShapeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var type = typeof (T);Di2015NewLine        if(_registry.ContainsKey(type))Di2015NewLine            _registry[type] = instructions;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _registry.Add(type, instructions);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IDrawInstructions Lookup(Shape shape)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var type = shape.GetType();Di2015NewLine        if (!_registry.ContainsKey(type)) return null;Di2015NewLine        return _registry[type];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SquareDrawInstructions: IDrawInstructionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void Draw(Shape shape, IShapeRenderer renderer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var square = shape as Square;Di2015NewLine        if (square == null) throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine        // draw 4 sidesDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// in your global.asax.cs or bootstrapper classDi2015NewLineShapeDrawInstructionsRegistry.Register<Square>(new SquareDrawInstructions());Di2015NewLineShapeDrawInstructionsRegistry.Register<Triangle>(new TriangleDrawInstructions());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// your loopDi2015NewLinevar renderer = new HtmlRenderer();Di2015NewLineforeach (var shape in shapes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var instructions = ShapeDrawInstructionsRegistry.Lookup(shape);Di2015NewLine    instructions.Draw(shape, renderer);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ClipBoardDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern Int32 IsClipboardFormatAvailable( uint format );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern Int32 OpenClipboard( IntPtr hWndNewOwner );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern IntPtr GetClipboardData( uint uFormat );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern Int32 CloseClipboard();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern Int32 GlobalLock( IntPtr hMem );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern Int32 GlobalUnlock( IntPtr hMem );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32.dll")]Di2015NewLine        public static extern UIntPtr GlobalSize(IntPtr hMem);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const uint CF_TEXT = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string PasteTextFromClipboard()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string result = "";Di2015NewLine            if( IsClipboardFormatAvailable( CF_TEXT ) == 0 )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return result; 4748383Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void getRGB(this Bitmap image, int startX, int startY, int w, int h, int[] rgbArray, int offset, int scansize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int PixelWidth = 3;Di2015NewLine        const PixelFormat PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // En garde!Di2015NewLine        if (image == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("image");Di2015NewLine        if (rgbArray == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("rgbArray");Di2015NewLine        if (startX < 0 || startX + w > image.Width) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("startX");Di2015NewLine        if (startY < 0 || startY + h > image.Height) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("startY");Di2015NewLine        if (w < 0 || w > scansize || w > image.Width) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("w");Di2015NewLine        if (h < 0 || (rgbArray.Length < offset + h * scansize) || h > image.Height) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("h");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BitmapData data = image.LockBits(new Rectangle(startX, startY, w, h), System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] pixelData = new Byte[data.Stride];Di2015NewLine            for (int scanline = 0; scanline < data.Height; scanline++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Marshal.Copy(data.Scan0 + (scanline * data.Stride), pixelData, 0, data.Stride);Di2015NewLine                for (int pixeloffset = 0; pixeloffset < data.Width; pixeloffset++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb means the data is storedDi2015NewLine                    // in memory as BGR. We want RGB, so we must do some Di2015NewLine                    // bit-shuffling.Di2015NewLine                    rgbArray[offset + (scanline * scansize) + pixeloffset] = Di2015NewLine                        (pixelData[pixeloffset * PixelWidth + 2] << 16) +   // R Di2015NewLine                        (pixelData[pixeloffset * PixelWidth + 1] << 8) +    // GDi2015NewLine                        pixelData[pixeloffset * PixelWidth];                // BDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            image.UnlockBits(data);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
4748383Di2015UniqueSeparator        Bitmap foo = Bitmap.FromFile(@"somefile.jpg") as Bitmap;Di2015NewLine        int[] rgbArray = new int[100];Di2015NewLine        foo.getRGB(1, 1, 10, 10, rgbArray, 0, 10);Di2015NewLine

T GetProperty<T>(IActiveScriptProperty prop, int index, T defaultValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object value;Di2015NewLine        if (prop.GetProperty(index, IntPtr.Zero, out value) != 0)Di2015NewLine            return defaultValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (T)Convert.ChangeType(value, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return defaultValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="ScriptEngine"/> class. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="language">The scripting language. Standard Windows Script engines names are 'jscript' or 'vbscript'.</param> Di2015NewLine    public ScriptEngine(string language)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (language == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("language");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type engine;Di2015NewLine        Guid clsid;Di2015NewLine        if (Guid.TryParse(language, out clsid))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            engine = Type.GetTypeFromCLSID(clsid, true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine revision);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return _version;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the engine _engine as IActiveScriptProperty;Di2015NewLine        if (property == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return property.GetProperty(index, IntPtr.Zero, out Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="name">The name. May not be null.</param> Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">The value. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="expression">The expression. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="text">The text to parse.</param> Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>An instance of the ParsedScript class.</returns> Di2015NewLine    public ParsedScript Parse(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (text == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("text");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (ParsedScript)Parse(text, false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private object Parse(string text, bool expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const string varName = "x___";Di2015NewLine        object result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _engine.SetScriptState(ScriptState.Connected);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ScriptText flags = ScriptText.None;Di2015NewLine        if (expression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            flags |= ScriptText.IsExpression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // immediate expression computation seems to work only for 64-bit Di2015NewLine            // so hack something for 32-bit... null)Di2015NewLine                        throw Site.LastException;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    throw;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine dispatch);Di2015NewLine        return parsed;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or 4749266Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.ObjectModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Specialized;Di2015NewLineusing ReactiveUI;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace RxTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class TestEntity :  ReactiveObject, INotifyPropertyChanged, INotifyPropertyChangingDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string _File;Di2015NewLine        public int _Rating = 0;Di2015NewLine        public string FileDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _File; }Di2015NewLine            set { this.RaiseAndSetIfChanged(x => x.File, value); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int RatingDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return this._Rating; }Di2015NewLine            set { this.RaiseAndSetIfChanged(x => x.Rating, value); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public TestEntity()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class TestModelDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private IEnumerable<TestEntity> collection { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        private IDisposable sub;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public TestModel()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.collection = new ObservableCollection<TestEntity>() {Di2015NewLine            new TestEntity() { File = "MySong.mp3", Rating = 5 },Di2015NewLine            new TestEntity() { File = "Heart.mp3", Rating = 5 },Di2015NewLine            new TestEntity() { File = "KarmaPolice.mp3", Rating = 5 }};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var filter = new Func<int, bool>( Rating => (Rating == 0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var target = new ObservableCollection<TestEntity>();Di2015NewLine            target.CollectionChanged += new NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler(target_CollectionChanged);Di2015NewLine            var react = new ReactiveCollection<TestEntity>(this.collection);Di2015NewLine            react.ChangeTrackingEnabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // update the target projection collection if an item is addedDi2015NewLine            react.ItemsAdded.Subscribe( v => { if (filter.Invoke(v.Rating)) target.Add(v); } );Di2015NewLine            // update the target projection collection if an item is removed (and it was in the target)Di2015NewLine            react.ItemsRemoved.Subscribe(v => { if (filter.Invoke(v.Rating) && target.Contains(v)) target.Remove(v); });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // track items changed in the collection.  Filter only if the property "Rating" changesDi2015NewLine            var ratingChangingStream = react.ItemChanging.Where(i => i.PropertyName == "Rating").Select(i => new { Rating = i.Sender.Rating, Entity = i.Sender });Di2015NewLine            var ratingChangedStream = react.ItemChanged.Where(i => i.PropertyName == "Rating").Select(i => new { Rating = i.Sender.Rating, Entity = i.Sender });Di2015NewLine            // pair the two streams together for before and after the entity has changed.  Make changes to the targetDi2015NewLine            Observable.Zip(ratingChangingStream,ratingChangedStream, Di2015NewLine                (changingItem, changedItem) => new { ChangingRating=(int)changingItem.Rating, ChangedRating=(int)changedItem.Rating, Entity=changedItem.Entity})Di2015NewLine                .Subscribe(v => { Di2015NewLine                    if (filter.Invoke(v.ChangingRating) && (!filter.Invoke(v.ChangedRating))) target.Remove(v.Entity);Di2015NewLine                    if ((!filter.Invoke(v.ChangingRating)) && filter.Invoke(v.ChangedRating)) target.Add(v.Entity);Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // should fire CollectionChanged Add in the target view model collectionDi2015NewLine            this.collection.ElementAt(0).Rating = 0;Di2015NewLine            // should fire CollectionChanged Remove in the target view model collectionDi2015NewLine            this.collection.ElementAt(0).Rating = 5;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void target_CollectionChanged(object sender, NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(e.Action);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

afterComplete)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (blockingWork == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("blockingWork");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _token = token;Di2015NewLine RunTask()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_beginWork != null)Di2015NewLine            _beginWork();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var innerTask = new Task(_blockingWork, Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine        public static byte[] GetBytes(uint value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new byte[4] { Di2015NewLine                    (byte)(value & 0xFF), };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static unsafe byte[] GetBytes(float value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            uint val = *((uint*)&value);Di2015NewLine            return GetBytes(val);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static unsafe byte[] GetBytes(float value, ByteOrder order)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine (uint)(Di2015NewLine                value[0 + index] << 0 |Di2015NewLine                value[1 + index] << 8 |Di2015NewLine                value[2 + index] << 16 |Di2015NewLine                value[3 + index] << 24);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static unsafe float ToSingle(byte[] value, int index)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            uint i = ToUInt32(value, index);Di2015NewLine            return *(((float*)&i));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static unsafe float ToSingle(byte[] value, int index, ByteOrder order)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (order != ByteOrder.LittleEndian)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Array.Reverse(value, index, value.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return ToSingle(value, index);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public enum ByteOrderDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            LittleEndian,Di2015NewLine            BigEndianDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static public bool IsLittleEndianDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                unsafeDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int i = 1;Di2015NewLine                    char* p = (char*)&i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return (p[0] == 1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace BitConverterTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] msbFirst = new byte[] { 0x42, 0xF6, 0xE9, 0xE0 };Di2015NewLine            byte[] lsbFirst = new byte[] { 0xE0, 0xE9, 0xF6, 0x42 };Di2015NewLine            const float 4751383Di2015UniqueSeparator// No need for byte length, since you're passing in a bit countDi2015NewLineprivate int ParseByteArray(byte[] recordData, int offset, int bitOffset, Di2015NewLine       int bitCount)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(bitCount < 1 || bitCount > 32) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("bitCount must be between 1 and 32");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     int output = 0;Di2015NewLine    int byteCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte rightMask = (byte)(((1 << bitOffset) - 1) << (8 - bitOffset));Di2015NewLine    byte leftMask = (byte)(255 ^ rightMask);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (bitCount > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte data = (byte)(((recordData[offset] & leftMask) << bitOffset) + Di2015NewLine                    ((bitCount > 8 - bitOffset ? Di2015NewLine                    ((recordData[offset + 1] & rightMask) >> (8 - bitOffset)) Di2015NewLine                    : 0)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (bitCount < 8)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte mask = (byte)(255^((1 << (8 - bitCount)) - 1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            data = (byte)((data & mask) >> (8 - bitCount));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        offset++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        output += data << (byteCount * 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byteCount++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bitCount -= Math.Min(bitCount, 8);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return output;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4760665Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine     public bool Hero { get; set; }Di2015NewLine     public int Age { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4760665Di2015UniqueSeparator   string name = null;Di2015NewLine   int? age = 18;Di2015NewLine   Expression<Func<MyClass, bool>> myExpr = Di2015NewLine      x => (string.IsNullOrEmpty(name) || x.Name == name) && Di2015NewLine           (!age.HasValue || x.Age > (age ?? 0));Di2015NewLine   myExpr = myExpr.RemoveCloture(); // this line here - removes the cloture - Di2015NewLine               // and replaces it with constant values - and shortcuts Di2015NewLine               // boolean evaluations that are no longer necessary.Di2015NewLine               // in effect this expression now becomes :Di2015NewLine               // x => x.Age > 18Di2015NewLine   bool result = myExpr.Compile()(Di2015NewLine      new MyClass {Name = "Rondon", Hero = true, Age = 92});Di2015NewLine
4760665Di2015UniqueSeparatorRemoveCloture();
4760665Di2015UniqueSeparator// using System;Di2015NewLine// using System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ClotureRemoverDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#region Public MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Expression<TExpressionType> RemoveCloture<TExpressionType>(Di2015NewLine    this Expression<TExpressionType> e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var converter = new RemoveClotureVisitor();Di2015NewLine    var newBody = converter.Visit(e.Body);Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<TExpressionType>(newBody, e.Parameters);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate class RemoveClotureVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RemoveClotureVisitor()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!RequiresParameterVisitor.RequiresParameter(node))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Expression<Func<object>> funct = () => new object();Di2015NewLine            funct = Expression.Lambda<Func<object>>(Expression.Convert(node, typeof(object)), funct.Parameters);Di2015NewLine            object res = funct.Compile()();Di2015NewLine            return ConstantExpression.Constant(res, node.Type);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitBinary(BinaryExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((node.NodeType == ExpressionType.AndAlso) || (node.NodeType == ExpressionType.OrElse))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Expression newLeft = Visit(node.Left);Di2015NewLine            Expression newRight = Visit(node.Right);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool isOr = (node.NodeType == ExpressionType.OrElse);Di2015NewLine            bool value;Di2015NewLine            if (IsBoolConst(newLeft, out value))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (value ^ isOr)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return newRight;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return newLeft;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (IsBoolConst(newRight, out value))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (value ^ isOr)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return newLeft;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return newRight;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return base.VisitBinary(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitUnary(UnaryExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (node.NodeType == ExpressionType.Convert || node.NodeType == ExpressionType.ConvertChecked)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Expression newOpperand = Visit(node.Operand);Di2015NewLine            if (newOpperand.Type == node.Type)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return newOpperand;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return base.VisitUnary(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool IsBoolConst(Expression node, out bool value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ConstantExpression asConst = node as ConstantExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (asConst != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (asConst.Type == typeof(bool))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                value = (bool)asConst.Value;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        value = false;Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate class RequiresParameterVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected RequiresParameterVisitor()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool RequiresParameter(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RequiresParameterVisitor visitor = new RequiresParameterVisitor();Di2015NewLine        visitor.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine        return visitor.result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = true;Di2015NewLine        return base.VisitParameter(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal bool result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4763137Di2015UniqueSeparator[DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError=true, CharSet=CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLinestatic extern uint GetLongPathName(string ShortPath, StringBuilder sb, int buffer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("kernel32.dll")]Di2015NewLinestatic extern uint GetShortPathName(string longpath, StringBuilder sb, int buffer); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected static string GetWindowsPhysicalPath(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(255);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // names with long extension can cause the short name to be actually larger thanDi2015NewLine        // the long name.Di2015NewLine        GetShortPathName(path, builder, builder.Capacity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        path = builder.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        uint result = GetLongPathName(path, builder, builder.Capacity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (result > 0 && result < builder.Capacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Success retrieved long file nameDi2015NewLine            builder[0] = char.ToLower(builder[0]);Di2015NewLine            return builder.ToString(0, (int)result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (result > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Need more capacity in the bufferDi2015NewLine            //specified in the result variableDi2015NewLine            builder = new StringBuilder((int)result);Di2015NewLine            result = GetLongPathName(path, builder, builder.Capacity);Di2015NewLine            builder[0] = char.ToLower(builder[0]);Di2015NewLine            return builder.ToString(0, (int)result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4763246Di2015UniqueSeparator_bw.ReportProgress(e.FileProcessedCount, e);
4763246Di2015UniqueSeparatorOnFileProcessCompleted
4763246Di2015UniqueSeparatorDoWork

4763246Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void DoWork (object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{      Di2015NewLine   BackgroundWorker bg = sender as BackgroundWorker;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   var files = GetFiles();Di2015NewLine   int fileCount = files.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   var fileProcessor = new FileProcesser();Di2015NewLine   for(int i = 0; i < fileCount; i++)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      fileProcessor.ProcessFile(files[i]);Di2015NewLine      bg.ReportProgress( (uint)((i / (double)fileCount) * 100));Di2015NewLine   } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4764016Di2015UniqueSeparator  public partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Bitmap bm;Di2015NewLine    Color [,] colors;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      bm = (Bitmap)Bitmap.FromFile("x.bmp");Di2015NewLine      colors = new Color[bm.Width, bm.Height];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Form1_Paint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      e.Graphics.DrawImage(bm,new Point(0,0));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Form1_KeyUp(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      //Change the colors a little bit on each KeyUp.Di2015NewLine      //On NumPad1, change red.Di2015NewLine      //On NumPad2, change green.Di2015NewLine      //On NumPad3, change blue.Di2015NewLine      //Mod with 256 to ensure a value between 0 and 255.Di2015NewLine      int rInc = 0;Di2015NewLine      int gInc = 0;Di2015NewLine      int bInc = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      switch (e.KeyCode)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        case Keys.NumPad1:Di2015NewLine          rInc = 20;Di2015NewLine          break;Di2015NewLine        case Keys.NumPad2:Di2015NewLine          gInc = 20;Di2015NewLine          break;Di2015NewLine        case Keys.NumPad3:Di2015NewLine          bInc = 20;Di2015NewLine          break;Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine          break;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      for (int x = 0; x < bm.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < bm.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          colors[x, y] = bm.GetPixel(x, y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      for (int x = 0; x < bm.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < bm.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          Color c = colors[x, y];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          int r = (c.R + rInc) % 256;Di2015NewLine          int g = (c.G + gInc) % 256;Di2015NewLine          int b = (c.B + bInc) % 256;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          c = Color.FromArgb(255, r, g, b);Di2015NewLine          bm.SetPixel(x, y, c);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Invalidate();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

4765583Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            IntPtr module = LoadLibraryEx(@"C:\\windows\\system32\\user32.dll", IntPtr.Zero, 2);Di2015NewLine            if (module == IntPtr.Zero) throw new Win32Exception();Di2015NewLine            if (!EnumResourceNames(module, (IntPtr)3, new EnumResNameProc(ListCallback), IntPtr.Zero))Di2015NewLine                throw new Win32Exception();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Win32Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static bool ListCallback(IntPtr hModule, IntPtr type, IntPtr name, IntPtr lp) {Di2015NewLine        long idorname = (long)name;Di2015NewLine        if (idorname >> 16 == 0) Console.WriteLine("#{0}", idorname);Di2015NewLine        else Console.WriteLine(Marshal.PtrToStringAnsi(name));Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public delegate bool EnumResNameProc(IntPtr hModule, IntPtr type, IntPtr name, IntPtr lp);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    public extern static bool EnumResourceNames(IntPtr hModule, IntPtr type, EnumResNameProc lpEnumFunc, IntPtr lParam);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    public extern static IntPtr LoadLibraryEx(string lpFileName, IntPtr hFile, int dwFlags);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4765626Di2015UniqueSeparator- Full trust  your code can do anything that the account running it can do.Di2015NewLine- High trust  same as above except your code cannot call into unmanaged code. i.e. Win32 APIs, COM interop.Di2015NewLine- Medium trust  same as above except your code cannot see any part of the file system except its application directory.Di2015NewLine- Low trust  same as above except your code cannot make any out-of-process calls. i.e. calls to a database, network, etc.Di2015NewLine- Minimal trust  code is restricted from anything but the most trival processing (calculating algorithms).Di2015NewLine

4766267Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void DoThatExcelThing()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ApplicationClass myExcel;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        myExcel = GetObject(,"Excel.Application")Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        myExcel = New ApplicationClass()Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    myExcel.Visible = true;Di2015NewLine    Workbook wb1 = myExcel.Workbooks.Add("");Di2015NewLine    Worksheet ws1 = (Worksheet)wb1.Worksheets[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Read the connection string from App.ConfigDi2015NewLine    string strConn = System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.ConnectionStrings["NewConnString"].ConnectionString;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Open a connection to the databaseDi2015NewLine    SqlConnection myConn = new SqlConnection();Di2015NewLine    myConn.ConnectionString = strConn;Di2015NewLine    myConn.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Establish the queryDi2015NewLine    SqlCommand myCmd = new SqlCommand("select * from employees", myConn);Di2015NewLine    SqlDataReader myRdr = myCmd.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Read the data and put into the spreadsheet.Di2015NewLine    int j = 3;Di2015NewLine    while (myRdr.Read())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i=0 ; i < myRdr.FieldCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ws1.Cells[j, i+1] = myRdr[i].ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        j++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Populate the column namesDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < myRdr.FieldCount ; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ws1.Cells[2, i+1] = myRdr.GetName(i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    myRdr.Close();Di2015NewLine    myConn.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Add some formattingDi2015NewLine    Range rng1 = ws1.get_Range("A1", "H1");Di2015NewLine    rng1.Font.Bold = true;Di2015NewLine    rng1.Font.ColorIndex = 3;Di2015NewLine    rng1.HorizontalAlignment = XlHAlign.xlHAlignCenter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Range rng2 = ws1.get_Range("A2", "H50");Di2015NewLine    rng2.WrapText = false;Di2015NewLine    rng2.EntireColumn.AutoFit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Add a header rowDi2015NewLine    ws1.get_Range("A1", "H1").EntireRow.Insert(XlInsertShiftDirection.xlShiftDown, Missing.Value);Di2015NewLine    ws1.Cells[1, 1] = "Employee Contact List";Di2015NewLine    Range rng3 = ws1.get_Range("A1", "H1");Di2015NewLine    rng3.Merge(Missing.Value);Di2015NewLine    rng3.Font.Size = 16;Di2015NewLine    rng3.Font.ColorIndex = 3;Di2015NewLine    rng3.Font.Underline = true;Di2015NewLine    rng3.Font.Bold = true;Di2015NewLine    rng3.VerticalAlignment = XlVAlign.xlVAlignCenter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Save and closeDi2015NewLine    string strFileName = String.Format("Employees{0}.xlsx", DateTime.Now.ToString("HHmmss"));Di2015NewLine    System.IO.File.Delete(strFileName);Di2015NewLine    wb1.SaveAs(strFileName, XlFileFormat.xlWorkbookDefault, Missing.Value, Missing.Value, Missing.Value, Missing.Value,Di2015NewLine        XlSaveAsAccessMode.xlExclusive, Missing.Value, false, Missing.Value, Missing.Value, Missing.Value);Di2015NewLine    myExcel.Quit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4766300Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Dynamic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication10 {Di2015NewLine    class Program {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine            dynamic dynamicObj = new MyDynamicObject(new TestPlugin());Di2015NewLine            dynamicObj.Foo();Di2015NewLine            dynamicObj.Bar();Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class TestPlugin {Di2015NewLine        public void Foo() {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("TestPlugin Foo");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Bar() {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("TestPlugin Bar");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class MyDynamicObject : IDynamicMetaObjectProvider {Di2015NewLine        internal readonly object[] _plugins;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Foo() {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("MyDynamicObject Foo");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Bar() {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("MyDynamicObject Bar");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public MyDynamicObject(params object[] plugins) {Di2015NewLine            _plugins = plugins;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        class Meta : DynamicMetaObject {Di2015NewLine            public Meta(Expression parameter, BindingRestrictions restrictions, MyDynamicObject self)Di2015NewLine                : base(parameter, restrictions, self) {Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public override DynamicMetaObject BindInvokeMember(InvokeMemberBinder binder, DynamicMetaObject[] args) {                Di2015NewLine                // get the default binding the language would return if we weren't involvedDi2015NewLine                // This will either access a property on MyDynamicObject or it will reportDi2015NewLine                // an error in a language appropriate manner.Di2015NewLine                DynamicMetaObject errorSuggestion = binder.FallbackInvokeMember(this, args);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // run through the plugins and replace our current rule.  Running throughDi2015NewLine                // the list forward means the last plugin has the highest precedence becauseDi2015NewLine                // it may throw away the previous rules if it succeeds.Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < Value._plugins.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine                    var pluginDo = DynamicMetaObject.Create(Value._plugins[i],Di2015NewLine                        Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                            typeof(MyDynamicObjectOps).GetMethod("GetPlugin"),Di2015NewLine                            Expression,Di2015NewLine                            Expression.Constant(i)Di2015NewLine                        )Di2015NewLine                    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    errorSuggestion = binder.FallbackInvokeMember(pluginDo, args, errorSuggestion);                    Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Do we want DynamicMetaObject to have precedence?  If so then we can doDi2015NewLine                // one more bind passing what we've produced so far as the rule.  Or if theDi2015NewLine                // plugins have precedence we could just return the value.  We'll do thatDi2015NewLine                // here based upon the member name.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (binder.Name == "Foo") {Di2015NewLine                    return binder.FallbackInvokeMember(this, args, errorSuggestion);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return errorSuggestion;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public new MyDynamicObject Value {Di2015NewLine                get {Di2015NewLine                    return (MyDynamicObject)base.Value;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region IDynamicMetaObjectProvider MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public DynamicMetaObject GetMetaObject(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression parameter) {Di2015NewLine            return new Meta(parameter, BindingRestrictions.Empty, this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static class MyDynamicObjectOps {Di2015NewLine        public static object GetPlugin(object myDo, int index) {Di2015NewLine            return ((MyDynamicObject)myDo)._plugins[index];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4768721Di2015UniqueSeparatorPASSWORD_CHARS_SPECIAL
4768721Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class RandomPasswordDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Define default min and max password lengths.Di2015NewLine    private static int DEFAULT_MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH = 8;Di2015NewLine    private static int DEFAULT_MAX_PASSWORD_LENGTH = 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Define supported password characters divided into groups.Di2015NewLine    // You can add (or remove) characters to (from) these groups.Di2015NewLine    private static string PASSWORD_CHARS_LCASE = "abcdefgijkmnopqrstwxyz";Di2015NewLine    private static string PASSWORD_CHARS_UCASE = "ABCDEFGHJKLMNPQRSTWXYZ";Di2015NewLine    private static string PASSWORD_CHARS_NUMERIC = "23456789";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Generates a random password.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    /// Randomly generated password.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// The length of the generated password will be determined atDi2015NewLine    /// random. It will be no shorter than the minimum default andDi2015NewLine    /// no longer than maximum default.Di2015NewLine    /// </remarks>Di2015NewLine    public static string Generate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Generate(DEFAULT_MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH,Di2015NewLine                        DEFAULT_MAX_PASSWORD_LENGTH);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Generates a random password of the exact length.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="length">Di2015NewLine    /// Exact password length.Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    /// Randomly generated password.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string Generate(int length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Generate(length, length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Generates a random password.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="minLength">Di2015NewLine    /// Minimum password length.Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="maxLength">Di2015NewLine    /// Maximum password length.Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    /// Randomly generated password.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// The length of the generated password will be determined atDi2015NewLine    /// random and it will fall with the range determined by theDi2015NewLine    /// function parameters.Di2015NewLine    /// </remarks>Di2015NewLine    public static string Generate(int minLength,Di2015NewLine                                  int maxLength)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Make sure that input parameters are valid.Di2015NewLine        if (minLength <= 0 || maxLength <= 0 || minLength > maxLength)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a local array containing supported password charactersDi2015NewLine        // grouped by types. You can remove character groups from thisDi2015NewLine        // array, but doing so will weaken the password strength.Di2015NewLine        char[][] charGroups = new char[][] Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PASSWORD_CHARS_LCASE.ToCharArray(),Di2015NewLine            PASSWORD_CHARS_UCASE.ToCharArray(),Di2015NewLine            PASSWORD_CHARS_NUMERIC.ToCharArray(),Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use this array to track the number of unused characters in eachDi2015NewLine        // character group.Di2015NewLine        int[] charsLeftInGroup = new int[charGroups.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Initially, all characters in each group are not used.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < charsLeftInGroup.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            charsLeftInGroup[i] = charGroups[i].Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use this array to track (iterate through) unused character groups.Di2015NewLine        int[] leftGroupsOrder = new int[charGroups.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Initially, all character groups are not used.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < leftGroupsOrder.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            leftGroupsOrder[i] = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Because we cannot use the default randomizer, which is based on theDi2015NewLine        // current time (it will produce the same "random" number within aDi2015NewLine        // second), we will use a random number generator to seed theDi2015NewLine        // randomizer.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use a 4-byte array to fill it with random bytes and convert it thenDi2015NewLine        // to an integer value.Di2015NewLine        byte[] randomBytes = new byte[4];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Generate 4 random bytes.Di2015NewLine        RNGCryptoServiceProvider rng = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine        rng.GetBytes(randomBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert 4 bytes into a 32-bit integer value.Di2015NewLine        int seed = (randomBytes[0] & 0x7f) << 24 |Di2015NewLine                    randomBytes[1] << 16 |Di2015NewLine                    randomBytes[2] << 8 |Di2015NewLine                    randomBytes[3];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Now, this is real randomization.Di2015NewLine        Random random = new Random(seed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This array will hold password characters.Di2015NewLine        char[] password = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Allocate appropriate memory for the password.Di2015NewLine        if (minLength < maxLength)Di2015NewLine            password = new char[random.Next(minLength, maxLength + 1)];Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            password = new char[minLength];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Index of the next character to be added to password.Di2015NewLine        int nextCharIdx;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Index of the next character group to be processed.Di2015NewLine        int nextGroupIdx;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Index which will be used to track not processed character groups.Di2015NewLine        int nextLeftGroupsOrderIdx;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Index of the last non-processed character in a group.Di2015NewLine        int lastCharIdx;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Index of the last non-processed group.Di2015NewLine        int lastLeftGroupsOrderIdx = leftGroupsOrder.Length - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Generate password characters one at a time.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < password.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If only one character group remained unprocessed, process it;Di2015NewLine            // otherwise, pick a random character group from the unprocessedDi2015NewLine            // group list. To allow a special character to appear in theDi2015NewLine            // first position, increment the second parameter of the NextDi2015NewLine            // function call by one, i.e. lastLeftGroupsOrderIdx + 1.Di2015NewLine            if (lastLeftGroupsOrderIdx == 0)Di2015NewLine                nextLeftGroupsOrderIdx = 0;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                nextLeftGroupsOrderIdx = random.Next(0,Di2015NewLine                                                     lastLeftGroupsOrderIdx);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get the actual index of the character group, from which we willDi2015NewLine            // pick the next character.Di2015NewLine            nextGroupIdx = leftGroupsOrder[nextLeftGroupsOrderIdx];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get the index of the last unprocessed characters in this group.Di2015NewLine            lastCharIdx = charsLeftInGroup[nextGroupIdx] - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If only one unprocessed character is left, pick it; otherwise,Di2015NewLine            // get a random character from the unused character list.Di2015NewLine            if (lastCharIdx == 0)Di2015NewLine                nextCharIdx = 0;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                nextCharIdx = random.Next(0, lastCharIdx + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add this character to the password.Di2015NewLine            password[i] = charGroups[nextGroupIdx][nextCharIdx];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If we processed the last character in this group, start over.Di2015NewLine            if (lastCharIdx == 0)Di2015NewLine                charsLeftInGroup[nextGroupIdx] =Di2015NewLine                                          charGroups[nextGroupIdx].Length;Di2015NewLine            // There are more unprocessed characters left.Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Swap processed character with the last unprocessed characterDi2015NewLine                // so that we don't pick it until we process all characters inDi2015NewLine                // this group.Di2015NewLine                if (lastCharIdx != nextCharIdx)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    char temp = charGroups[nextGroupIdx][lastCharIdx];Di2015NewLine                    charGroups[nextGroupIdx][lastCharIdx] =Di2015NewLine                                charGroups[nextGroupIdx][nextCharIdx];Di2015NewLine                    charGroups[nextGroupIdx][nextCharIdx] = temp;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // Decrement the number of unprocessed characters inDi2015NewLine                // this group.Di2015NewLine                charsLeftInGroup[nextGroupIdx]--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If we processed the last group, start all over.Di2015NewLine            if (lastLeftGroupsOrderIdx == 0)Di2015NewLine                lastLeftGroupsOrderIdx = leftGroupsOrder.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine            // There are more unprocessed groups left.Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Swap processed group with the last unprocessed groupDi2015NewLine                // so that we don't pick it until we process all groups.Di2015NewLine                if (lastLeftGroupsOrderIdx != nextLeftGroupsOrderIdx)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int temp = leftGroupsOrder[lastLeftGroupsOrderIdx];Di2015NewLine                    leftGroupsOrder[lastLeftGroupsOrderIdx] =Di2015NewLine                                leftGroupsOrder[nextLeftGroupsOrderIdx];Di2015NewLine                    leftGroupsOrder[nextLeftGroupsOrderIdx] = temp;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // Decrement the number of unprocessed groups.Di2015NewLine                lastLeftGroupsOrderIdx--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new string(password);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(RandomPassword.Generate(12));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4773864Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Bitmap CreateThumbnail(string filename, int width, int height)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Bitmap bmpOut = null;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Bitmap loBMP = new Bitmap(filename);Di2015NewLine        ImageFormat loFormat = loBMP.RawFormat;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        decimal lnRatio;Di2015NewLine        int lnNewWidth = 0;Di2015NewLine        int lnNewHeight = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //*** If the image is smaller than a thumbnail just return itDi2015NewLine        if (loBMP.Width < width && loBMP.Height < height)Di2015NewLine            return loBMP;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (loBMP.Width > loBMP.Height)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lnRatio = (decimal)width / loBMP.Width;Di2015NewLine            lnNewWidth = width;Di2015NewLine            decimal lnTemp = loBMP.Height * lnRatio;Di2015NewLine            lnNewHeight = (int)lnTemp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lnRatio = (decimal)height / loBMP.Height;Di2015NewLine            lnNewHeight = height;Di2015NewLine            decimal lnTemp = loBMP.Width * lnRatio;Di2015NewLine            lnNewWidth = (int)lnTemp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bmpOut = new Bitmap(lnNewWidth, lnNewHeight);Di2015NewLine        Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(bmpOut);Di2015NewLine        g.InterpolationMode = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLine        g.FillRectangle(Brushes.White, 0, 0, lnNewWidth, lnNewHeight);Di2015NewLine        g.DrawImage(loBMP, 0, 0, lnNewWidth, lnNewHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        loBMP.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return bmpOut;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4777404Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.Win32;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing !string.IsNullOrEmpty(args[0]) && File.Exists(args[0]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var programs = new InstalledPrograms();Di2015NewLine            var programKey = "RealPlay.exe".ToLowerInvariant();Di2015NewLine            if (programs.ContainsKey(programKey))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var programPath = 4779074Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass LockedAdder<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This field serves the role of the lockObj variable; it will beDi2015NewLine    // initialized when the type is instantiated.Di2015NewLine    public object LockObj = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This field serves as the list parameter; it will be set withinDi2015NewLine    // the method.Di2015NewLine    public IList<T> List;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This is the method for the lambda.Di2015NewLine    public void Add(T x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (LockObj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List.Add(x);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Action<T> GetLockedAdd<T>(IList<T> list)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Initializing the lockObj variable becomes equivalent toDi2015NewLine    // instantiating the generated class.Di2015NewLine    var lockedAdder = new LockedAdder<T> { List = list };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The lambda becomes a method call on the instance we haveDi2015NewLine    // just made.Di2015NewLine    return new Action<T>(lockedAdder.Add);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4779371Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>  Di2015NewLine/// method for changing the opacity of an image  Di2015NewLine/// </summary>  Di2015NewLine/// <param name="image">image to set opacity on</param>  Di2015NewLine/// <param name="opacity">percentage of opacity</param>  Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>  Di2015NewLinepublic Image SetImageOpacity(Image image, float opacity)  Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    try  Di2015NewLine    {  Di2015NewLine        //create a Bitmap the size of the image provided  Di2015NewLine        Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(image.Width, image.Height);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //create a graphics object from the image  Di2015NewLine        using (Graphics gfx = Graphics.FromImage(bmp)) {  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //create a color matrix object  Di2015NewLine            ColorMatrix matrix = new ColorMatrix();      Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //set the opacity  Di2015NewLine            matrix.Matrix33 = opacity;  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //create image attributes  Di2015NewLine            ImageAttributes attributes = new ImageAttributes();      Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //set the color(opacity) of the image  Di2015NewLine            attributes.SetColorMatrix(matrix, ColorMatrixFlag.Default, ColorAdjustType.Bitmap);    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //now draw the image  Di2015NewLine            gfx.DrawImage(image, new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height), 0, 0, image.Width, image.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel, attributes);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return bmp;  Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)  Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);  Di2015NewLine        return null;  Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

4780801Di2015UniqueSeparatorsplitArray = Regex.Split(subjectString, "(?<=^[^\\"]*(?:\\"[^\\"]*\\"[^\\"]*)*) (?=(?:[^\\"]*\\"[^\\"]*\\")*[^\\"]*$)");Di2015NewLine
4780801Di2015UniqueSeparator(?<=      # Assert that it's possible to match this before the current position (positive lookbehind):Di2015NewLine ^        # The start of the stringDi2015NewLine [^"]*    # Any number of non-quote charactersDi2015NewLine (?:      # Match the following group...Di2015NewLine  "[^"]*  # a quote, followed by any number of non-quote charactersDi2015NewLine  "[^"]*  # the sameDi2015NewLine )*       # ...zero or more times (so 0, 2, 4, ... quotes will match)Di2015NewLine)         # End of lookbehind assertion.Di2015NewLine[ ]       # Match a spaceDi2015NewLine(?=       # Assert that it's possible to match this after the current position (positive lookahead):Di2015NewLine (?:      # Match the following group...Di2015NewLine  [^"]*"  # see aboveDi2015NewLine  [^"]*"  # see aboveDi2015NewLine )*       # ...zero or more times.Di2015NewLine [^"]*    # Match any number of non-quote charactersDi2015NewLine $        # Match the end of the stringDi2015NewLine)         # End of lookahead assertionDi2015NewLine

4787418Di2015UniqueSeparatorn
4787418Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace CSharpSandboxDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void SomeTask(int sleepInterval, CountdownEvent countDown)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // pretend this did something more profoundDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(sleepInterval);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // need to signal in a finally block, otherwise an exception may occur and preventDi2015NewLine                // this from being signaledDi2015NewLine                countDown.Signal();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static CountdownEvent StartTasks(int count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Random rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            CountdownEvent countDown = new CountdownEvent(count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(_ => SomeTask(rnd.Next(100), countDown));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return countDown;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Starting. . .");Di2015NewLine            var stopWatch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine            using(CountdownEvent countdownEvent = StartTasks(100))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                countdownEvent.Wait();Di2015NewLine                // waits until the countdownEvent is signalled 100 timesDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            stopWatch.Stop();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Done! Elapsed time: {0} milliseconds", stopWatch.Elapsed.TotalMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4791932Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void CallWebService()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var _url = "http://xxxxxxxxx/Service1.asmx";Di2015NewLine            var _action = "http://xxxxxxxx/Service1.asmx?op=HelloWorld";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            XmlDocument soapEnvelopeXml = CreateSoapEnvelope();Di2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest webRequest = CreateWebRequest(_url, _action);Di2015NewLine            InsertSoapEnvelopeIntoWebRequest(soapEnvelopeXml, webRequest);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // begin async call to web request.Di2015NewLine            IAsyncResult asyncResult = webRequest.BeginGetResponse(null, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // suspend this thread until call is complete. You might want toDi2015NewLine            // do something usefull here like update your UI.Di2015NewLine            asyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // get the response from the completed web request.Di2015NewLine            string soapResult;Di2015NewLine            using (WebResponse webResponse = webRequest.EndGetResponse(asyncResult))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (StreamReader rd = new StreamReader(webResponse.GetResponseStream()))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    soapResult = rd.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(soapResult);        Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static HttpWebRequest CreateWebRequest(string url, string action)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest webRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine            webRequest.Headers.Add("SOAPAction", action);Di2015NewLine            webRequest.ContentType = "text/xml;charset=\\"utf-8\\"";Di2015NewLine            webRequest.Accept = "text/xml";Di2015NewLine            webRequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine            return webRequest;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static XmlDocument CreateSoapEnvelope()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XmlDocument soapEnvelop = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine            soapEnvelop.LoadXml(@"<SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:SOAP-ENV=""http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"" xmlns:xsi=""http://www.w3.org/1999/XMLSchema-instance"" xmlns:xsd=""http://www.w3.org/1999/XMLSchema""><SOAP-ENV:Body><HelloWorld xmlns=""http://tempuri.org/"" SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle=""http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/""><int1 xsi:type=""xsd:integer"">12</int1><int2 xsi:type=""xsd:integer"">32</int2></HelloWorld></SOAP-ENV:Body></SOAP-ENV:Envelope>");Di2015NewLine            return soapEnvelop;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void InsertSoapEnvelopeIntoWebRequest(XmlDocument soapEnvelopeXml, HttpWebRequest webRequest)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (Stream stream = webRequest.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                soapEnvelopeXml.Save(stream);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

4794649Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static HSLColor FromRGB(Byte R, Byte G, Byte B)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float _R = (R / 255f);Di2015NewLine        float _G = (G / 255f);Di2015NewLine        float _B = (B / 255f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float _Min = Math.Min(Math.Min(_R, _G), _B);Di2015NewLine        float _Max = Math.Max(Math.Max(_R, _G), _B);Di2015NewLine        float _Delta = _Max - _Min;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float H = 0;Di2015NewLine        float S = 0;Di2015NewLine        float L = (float)((_Max + _Min) / 2.0f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_Delta != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (L < 0.5f)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                S = (float)(_Delta / (_Max + _Min));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                S = (float)(_Delta / (2.0f - _Max - _Min));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_R == _Max)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                H = (_G - _B) / _Delta;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (_G == _Max)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                H = 2f + (_B - _R) / _Delta;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (_B == _Max)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                H = 4f + (_R - _G) / _Delta;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new HSLColor(H, S, L);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
4794649Di2015UniqueSeparatorH
4794649Di2015UniqueSeparatorH
4794649Di2015UniqueSeparator            //Convert to degreesDi2015NewLine            H = H * 60f;Di2015NewLine            if (H < 0) H += 360;Di2015NewLine
4794649Di2015UniqueSeparatorS
4794649Di2015UniqueSeparatorL
4794649Di2015UniqueSeparator    public Color ToRGB()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte r, g, b;Di2015NewLine        if (Saturation == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            r = (byte)Math.Round(Luminosity * 255d);Di2015NewLine            g = (byte)Math.Round(Luminosity * 255d);Di2015NewLine            b = (byte)Math.Round(Luminosity * 255d);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double t1, t2;Di2015NewLine            double th = Hue / 6.0d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Luminosity < 0.5d)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                t2 = Luminosity * (1d + Saturation);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                t2 = (Luminosity + Saturation) - (Luminosity * Saturation);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            t1 = 2d * Luminosity - t2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double tr, tg, tb;Di2015NewLine            tr = th + (1.0d / 3.0d);Di2015NewLine            tg = th;Di2015NewLine            tb = th - (1.0d / 3.0d);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tr = ColorCalc(tr, t1, t2);Di2015NewLine            tg = ColorCalc(tg, t1, t2);Di2015NewLine            tb = ColorCalc(tb, t1, t2);Di2015NewLine            r = (byte)Math.Round(tr * 255d);Di2015NewLine            g = (byte)Math.Round(tg * 255d);Di2015NewLine            b = (byte)Math.Round(tb * 255d);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Color.FromArgb(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static double ColorCalc(double c, double t1, double t2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (c < 0) c += 1d;Di2015NewLine        if (c > 1) c -= 1d;Di2015NewLine        if (6.0d * c < 1.0d) return t1 + (t2 - t1) * 6.0d * c;Di2015NewLine        if (2.0d * c < 1.0d) return t2;Di2015NewLine        if (3.0d * c < 2.0d) return t1 + (t2 - t1) * (2.0d / 3.0d - c) * 6.0d;Di2015NewLine        return t1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
