4799478Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing OpenTK;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass CubesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main() {Di2015NewLine        var resolution = 25;Di2015NewLine        var points = from i in Enumerable.Range(1, 8) select new Vector3(i / 4 % 2 * 2 - 1, i / 2 % 2 * 2 - 1, i % 2 * 2 - 1);Di2015NewLine        var lines = from a in pointsDi2015NewLine                    from b in pointsDi2015NewLine                    where (a - b).Length == 2  // adjacent pointsDi2015NewLine                       && a.X + a.Y + a.Z > b.X + b.Y + b.Z // select each pair onceDi2015NewLine                    select new { a, b };Di2015NewLine        var t = 0f;Di2015NewLine        while (true) {Di2015NewLine            t += .1f;Di2015NewLine            var projection = Matrix4.CreatePerspectiveFieldOfView(.8f, 1, .01f, 100f);Di2015NewLine            var view = Matrix4.LookAt(2 * new Vector3((float)Math.Sin(t), .5f, (float)Math.Cos(t)), Vector3.Zero, Vector3.UnitY);Di2015NewLine            Console.Clear();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var line in lines) {Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < resolution; i++) {Di2015NewLine                    var point = (1f / resolution) * (i * line.a + (resolution - 1 - i) * line.b); // interpolate a point between the two cornersDi2015NewLine                    var p1 = 5 * Vector3.Transform(point, view * projection) + new Vector3(30, 20, 0);Di2015NewLine                    Console.SetCursorPosition((int)p1.X, (int)p1.Y);Di2015NewLine                    Console.Write("#");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}   Di2015NewLine

4803363Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string GetGroupsForUser(string UserName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ManagementObjectSearcher searcher = new ManagementObjectSearcher("select * from Win32_GroupUser where PartComponent=\\"Win32_UserAccount.Domain='MyDomain',Name='" + UserName + "'\\"");Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder strGroups = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (ManagementObject mObject in searcher.Get())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ManagementPath path = new ManagementPath(mObject["GroupComponent"].ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (path.ClassName == "Win32_Group")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                String[] names = path.RelativePath.Split(',');Di2015NewLine                strGroups.Append(names[1].Substring(names[1].IndexOf("=") + 1).Replace('"', ' ').Trim() + ", ");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return strGroups.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

4803524Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo.Invoke
4803524Di2015UniqueSeparatorMethodInfo
4803524Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Bar(int value) { return value.ToString(); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object foo = new Foo();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We have an instance of something and want to call a method with this signature on it :Di2015NewLine    // public string Bar(int value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Cast and Direct method call");Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = ((Foo)foo).Bar(42);Di2015NewLine        result.Dump();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Create a lambda closing on the local scope.");Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Useless but i'll do it at the end by manual il generationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Func<int, string> func = i => ((Foo)foo).Bar(i);Di2015NewLine        var result = func(42);Di2015NewLine        result.Dump();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Using MethodInfo.Invoke");Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var method = foo.GetType().GetMethod("Bar");Di2015NewLine        var result = (string)method.Invoke(foo, new object[] { 42 });Di2015NewLine        result.Dump();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Using the dynamic keyword");Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var dynamicFoo = (dynamic)foo;Di2015NewLine        var result = (string)dynamicFoo.Bar(42);Di2015NewLine        result.Dump();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Using CreateDelegate");Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var method = foo.GetType().GetMethod("Bar");Di2015NewLine        var func = (Func<int, string>)Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<int, string>), foo, method);Di2015NewLine        var result = func(42);Di2015NewLine        result.Dump();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Create an expression and compile it to call the delegate on one instance.");Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var method = foo.GetType().GetMethod("Bar");Di2015NewLine        var thisParam = Expression.Constant(foo);Di2015NewLine        var valueParam = Expression.Parameter(typeof(int), "value");Di2015NewLine        var call = Expression.Call(thisParam, method, valueParam);Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<int, string>>(call, valueParam);Di2015NewLine        var func = lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine        var result = func(42);Di2015NewLine        result.Dump();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Create an expression and compile it to a delegate that could be called on any instance.");Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Note that in this case "Foo" must be known at compile time, obviously in this case you wantDi2015NewLine        // to do more than call a method, otherwise just call it !Di2015NewLine        var type = foo.GetType();Di2015NewLine        var method = type.GetMethod("Bar");Di2015NewLine        var thisParam = Expression.Parameter(type, "this");Di2015NewLine        var valueParam = Expression.Parameter(typeof(int), "value");Di2015NewLine        var call = Expression.Call(thisParam, method, valueParam);Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<Foo, int, string>>(call, thisParam, valueParam);Di2015NewLine        var func = lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine        var result = func((Foo)foo, 42);Di2015NewLine        result.Dump();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Create a DynamicMethod and compile it to a delegate that could be called on any instance.");Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Same thing as the previous expression sample. Foo need to be known at compile time and needDi2015NewLine        // to be provided to the delegate.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var type = foo.GetType();Di2015NewLine        var method = type.GetMethod("Bar");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var dynamicMethod = new DynamicMethod("Bar_", typeof(string), new [] { typeof(Foo), typeof(int) }, true);Di2015NewLine        var il = dynamicMethod.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine        il.DeclareLocal(typeof(string));Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Call, method);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLine        var func = (Func<Foo, int, string>)dynamicMethod.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<Foo, int, string>));Di2015NewLine        var result = func((Foo)foo, 42);Di2015NewLine        result.Dump();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Simulate closure without closures and in a lot more lines...");Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var type = foo.GetType();Di2015NewLine        var method = type.GetMethod("Bar");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The Foo class must be public for this to work, the "skipVisibility" argument ofDi2015NewLine        // DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate can't be emulated without breaking the .Net security model.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var assembly = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(Di2015NewLine            new AssemblyName("MyAssembly"), AssemblyBuilderAccess.Run);Di2015NewLine        var module = assembly.DefineDynamicModule("MyModule");Di2015NewLine        var tb = module.DefineType("MyType", TypeAttributes.Class | TypeAttributes.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var fooField = tb.DefineField("FooInstance", type, FieldAttributes.Public);Di2015NewLine        var barMethod = tb.DefineMethod("Bar_", MethodAttributes.Public, typeof(string), new [] { typeof(int) });Di2015NewLine        var il = barMethod.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine        il.DeclareLocal(typeof(string));Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // thisDi2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, fooField);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1); // argDi2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Call, method);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var closureType = tb.CreateType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var instance = closureType.GetConstructors().Single().Invoke(new object[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        closureType.GetField(fooField.Name).SetValue(instance, foo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var methodOnClosureType = closureType.GetMethod("Bar_");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var func = (Func<int, string>)Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<int, string>), instance,Di2015NewLine            closureType.GetMethod("Bar_"));Di2015NewLine        var result = func(42);Di2015NewLine        result.Dump();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4803594Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring epath = "GetName(System_String: ding dong, System_Int32:1).name";Di2015NewLineMyClass cls = new MyClass();Di2015NewLinevar v = cls.Eval(epath);Di2015NewLine
4803594Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar v = d.Execute(path)
4803594Di2015UniqueSeparator        public static object Eval(this object instance, string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] cmd = path.Split('.');Di2015NewLine        string subString = cmd[0];Di2015NewLine        object returnValue = null;Di2015NewLine        Type t = instance.GetType();Di2015NewLine        if (subString.Contains("("))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] paramString = subString.Split('(');Di2015NewLine            string[] parameters = paramString[1].Replace(")", "").Split(new Char[]{','},StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine            bool hasNoParams = parameters.Length == 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            List<Type> typeArray = null;Di2015NewLine            if (hasNoParams) typeArray = new List<Type>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (string parameter in parameters)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (parameter.Contains(":"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (typeArray == null) typeArray = new List<Type>();Di2015NewLine                    string[] typeValue = parameter.Split(':');Di2015NewLine                    Type paramType = Type.GetType(typeValue[0].Replace('_','.'));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    typeArray.Add(paramType);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            MethodInfo info = null;Di2015NewLine            if (typeArray == null)Di2015NewLine                info = t.GetMethod(paramString[0]);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                info = t.GetMethod(paramString[0], typeArray.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            ParameterInfo[] pInfo = info.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine            List<object> paramList = new List<object>();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < pInfo.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string currentParam = parameters[i];Di2015NewLine                if (currentParam.Contains(":"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    currentParam = currentParam.Split(':')[1];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                ParameterInfo pram = pInfo[i];Di2015NewLine                Type pType = pram.ParameterType;Di2015NewLine                object obj = Convert.ChangeType(currentParam, pType);Di2015NewLine                paramList.Add(obj);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (info == null) returnValue = null;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                returnValue = info.Invoke(instance, paramList.ToArray());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PropertyInfo pi = t.GetProperty(subString);Di2015NewLine            if (pi == null) returnValue = null;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                returnValue = pi.GetValue(instance, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (returnValue == null || cmd.Length == 1)Di2015NewLine            return returnValue;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            returnValue = returnValue.Eval(path.Replace(cmd[0] + ".", ""));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return returnValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

4807100Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void AddOne<S,T>(this S x, Expression<Func<S,T>> expr)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (expr.Body.NodeType != ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MemberExpression memberExpr = expr.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine    switch (memberExpr.Member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case MemberTypes.Field:Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FieldInfo field = memberExpr.Member as FieldInfo;Di2015NewLine                ulong value = Convert.ToUInt64(field.GetValue(x));Di2015NewLine                ++value;Di2015NewLine                field.SetValue(x, Convert.ChangeType(value, field.FieldType));Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        case MemberTypes.Property:Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PropertyInfo prop = memberExpr.Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine                ulong value = Convert.ToUInt64(prop.GetValue(x, null));Di2015NewLine                ++value;Di2015NewLine                prop.SetValue(x, Convert.ChangeType(value, prop.PropertyType), null);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4808017Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Func2<A, B> {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private Func<A, B> f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public Func2(Func<A, B> f) {Di2015NewLine    this.f = f;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public B invoke(long a) {Di2015NewLine    if (typeof(A) == typeof(long)) {Di2015NewLine      return (f as Func<long, B>)(a);Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine      throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public B invoke(object a) {Di2015NewLine    return f((A)a);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4808632Di2015UniqueSeparatorcan[number]
4808632Di2015UniqueSeparatornumber
4808632Di2015UniqueSeparatorcan[number]
4808632Di2015UniqueSeparatortrue
4808632Di2015UniqueSeparatorfalse
4808632Di2015UniqueSeparator0
4808632Di2015UniqueSeparatorcan[0]
4808632Di2015UniqueSeparatortrue
4808632Di2015UniqueSeparatorj
4808632Di2015UniqueSeparatoralready achieved sum + current number we try == j
4808632Di2015UniqueSeparatorj
4808632Di2015UniqueSeparatorprev
4808632Di2015UniqueSeparatorint UPPER_BOUND = number1 + number2 + ... + numbern //The largest number you can constructDi2015NewLinebool can[UPPER_BOUND + 1]; //can[number] is true if number can be constructedDi2015NewLinecan[0] = true; //0 is achievable always by not using any numberDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint prev[UPPER_BOUND + 1]; //prev[number] is the last number used to achieve sum "number"Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < N; i++) //Try to use every number(numbers[i]) from the input fileDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   for (int j = UPPER_BOUND; j >= 1; j--) //Try to see if j is an achievable sumDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      if (can[j]) continue; //It is already an achieved sum, so go to the next jDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (j - numbers[i] >= 0 && can[j - numbers[i]]) //If an (already achievable sum) + (numbers[i]) == j, then j is obviously achievableDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          can[j] = true;Di2015NewLine          prev[j] = numbers[i]; //To achieve j we used numbers[i]Di2015NewLine      } Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint CLOSEST_SUM = -1;Di2015NewLinefor (int i = SUM; i <= UPPER_BOUND; i++)Di2015NewLine   if (can[i])Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       //the closest number to SUM(larger than SUM) is iDi2015NewLine       CLOSEST_SUM = i;Di2015NewLine       break; Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint currentSum = CLOSEST_SUM;    Di2015NewLinedoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int usedNumber = prev[currentSum];Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(usedNumber);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    currentSum -= usedNumber;Di2015NewLine} while (currentSum > 0);Di2015NewLine
4808685Di2015UniqueSeparator$(function(){Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  $('a').click(function(e){Di2015NewLine    var proceed       = true ;Di2015NewLine    var anchor        = $(this) ;Di2015NewLine    var href          = anchor.attr('href') ;Di2015NewLine    var isExternalUrl = CheckForExternalUrl( href ) ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ( isExternalUrl )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      e.PreventDefault() ;Di2015NewLine      window.location = "outside_link.aspx?url=" + href ;Di2015NewLine      proceed         = false ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return proceed ;Di2015NewLine  }) ;Di2015NewLine}) ;Di2015NewLine

4816245Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // OP's method: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4815959Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] CryptPacket(byte[] packet)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int paksize = packet.Length - 2;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 2; i < paksize; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            packet[i] = (byte)(0x61 ^ packet[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return packet;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // http://stackoverflow.com/questions/321370 :)Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] StringToByteArray(string hex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Enumerable.Range(0, hex.Length).Di2015NewLine               Where(x => 0 == x % 2).Di2015NewLine               Select(x => Convert.ToByte(hex.Substring(x, 2), 16)).Di2015NewLine               ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string hex = "0C 00 E2 66 65 47 4E 09 04 13 65 00".Replace(" ", "");Di2015NewLine        byte[] input = StringToByteArray(hex);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Input: " + ASCIIEncoding.ASCII.GetString(input));Di2015NewLine        byte[] output = CryptPacket(input);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Output: " + ASCIIEncoding.ASCII.GetString(output));Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4817736Di2015UniqueSeparatorIValidatorFactory
4817736Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IValidationServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<ValidationError> Validate<T>(T entity)Di2015NewLine        where T : class;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class FluentValidationService : IValidationServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IValidatorFactory validatorFactory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FluentValidationService(IValidatorFactory validatorFactory)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.validatorFactory = validatorFactory;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<ValidationError> Validate<T>(T entity)Di2015NewLine        where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var validator = this.validatorFactory.GetValidator<T>();Di2015NewLine        var result = validator.Validate(entity);Di2015NewLine        return result.Errors.Select(e => new ValidationError(e.PropertyName, e.ErrorMessage));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Then implement FV's IValidatorFactory:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class NinjectValidatorFactory : ValidatorFactoryBaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IKernel kernel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NinjectValidatorFactory(IKernel kernel)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.kernel = kernel;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override IValidator CreateInstance(Type validatorType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return kernel.TryGet(validatorType) as IValidator;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// I then wire both of these in a Ninject Module:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ValidationModule : NinjectModuleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override void Load()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Bind<IValidationService>().To<FluentValidationService>().InRequestScope(); // Specific to MVC.Di2015NewLine        this.Bind<IValidatorFactory>().To<NinjectValidatorFactory>().InRequestScope();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Then I can use it inside a service:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class FooServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IValidationService validationService;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FooService(IValidationService validationService)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.validationService = validationService;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Add(Foo foo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(this.validationService.Validate(foo).Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Handle validation errors..Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // do other implementation details here.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4818245Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate readonly object _syncObj = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic object measure_queue_locking_performance()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int TestIterations = 5;Di2015NewLine    const int Iterations = (10 * 1000 * 1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Action<string, Action> time = (name, test) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < TestIterations; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TimeSpan elapsed = TimeTest(test, Iterations);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0}:{1:F2}ms", name, elapsed.TotalMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    object itemOut, itemIn = new object();Di2015NewLine    Queue queue = new Queue();Di2015NewLine    Queue syncQueue = Queue.Synchronized(queue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Action test1 = () =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_syncObj) queue.Enqueue(itemIn);Di2015NewLine        lock (_syncObj) itemOut = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Action test2 = () =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        syncQueue.Enqueue(itemIn);Di2015NewLine        itemOut = syncQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Iterations:{0:0,0}\\r\\n", Iterations);Di2015NewLine    time("Queue+Lock", test1);Di2015NewLine    time("SynchonizedQueue", test2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return itemOut;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Reliability", "CA2001:AvoidCallingProblematicMethods", MessageId = "System.GC.Collect")]Di2015NewLineprivate static TimeSpan TimeTest(Action action, int iterations)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Action gc = () =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine        GC.WaitForFullGCComplete();Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Action empty = () => { };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stopwatch stopwatch1 = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int j = 0; j < iterations; j++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        empty();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TimeSpan loopElapsed = stopwatch1.Elapsed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    gc();Di2015NewLine    action(); //JITDi2015NewLine    action(); //OptimizeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stopwatch stopwatch2 = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int j = 0; j < iterations; j++) action();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    gc();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TimeSpan testElapsed = stopwatch2.Elapsed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (testElapsed - loopElapsed);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4819098Di2015UniqueSeparator// Sign an XML request and return itDi2015NewLinepublic static string SignRequest(string request, string SubjectName, string Signature, string keyInfoRefId)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(request))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("request");Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(SubjectName))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("SubjectName");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Load the certificate from the certificate store.Di2015NewLine    X509Certificate2 cert = GetCertificateBySubject(SubjectName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a new XML document.Di2015NewLine    XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Format the document to ignore white spaces.Di2015NewLine    doc.PreserveWhitespace = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Load the passed XML Di2015NewLine    doc.LoadXml(request);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the declaration as per Entrust sample provided -don't think it's necessary thoughDi2015NewLine    if (!(doc.FirstChild is XmlDeclaration))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlDeclaration declaration = doc.CreateXmlDeclaration("1.0", "UTF-8", string.Empty);Di2015NewLine        doc.InsertBefore(declaration, doc.FirstChild);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Remove the Action (MustUnderstand). Di2015NewLine    // TODO: Need to find a more elegant way to do soDi2015NewLine    XmlNode headerNode = null;Di2015NewLine    XmlNodeList nodeList = doc.GetElementsByTagName("Action");Di2015NewLine    if (nodeList.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        headerNode = nodeList[0].ParentNode;Di2015NewLine        headerNode.RemoveChild(nodeList[0]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set the body id - not in used but could be useful at a later stage of this projectDi2015NewLine    XmlNamespaceManager ns = new XmlNamespaceManager(doc.NameTable);    Di2015NewLine    ns.AddNamespace("s", "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/");Di2015NewLine    XmlElement body = doc.DocumentElement.SelectSingleNode(@"//s:Body", ns) as XmlElement;    Di2015NewLine    if (body == null)    Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException("No body tag found");Di2015NewLine    body.RemoveAllAttributes();  // no need to have namespaceDi2015NewLine    body.SetAttribute("Id", "ABC"); // Body Id could be passed as a paramDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a custom SignedXml object so that we could sign the keyinfoDi2015NewLine    CustomSignedXml signedXml = new CustomSignedXml(doc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the key to the SignedXml document. Di2015NewLine    signedXml.SigningKey = cert.PrivateKey;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a new KeyInfo object.Di2015NewLine    KeyInfo keyInfo = new KeyInfo();Di2015NewLine    keyInfo.Id = keyInfoRefId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Load the certificate into a KeyInfoX509Data objectDi2015NewLine    // and add it to the KeyInfo object.Di2015NewLine    KeyInfoX509Data keyInfoData = new KeyInfoX509Data();Di2015NewLine    keyInfoData.AddCertificate(cert);Di2015NewLine    keyInfo.AddClause(keyInfoData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the KeyInfo object to the SignedXml object.Di2015NewLine    signedXml.KeyInfo = keyInfo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a reference to be signed.Di2015NewLine    Reference reference = new Reference();Di2015NewLine    reference.Uri = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add an enveloped transformation to the reference.Di2015NewLine    XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform env = new XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform();Di2015NewLine    reference.AddTransform(env);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the reference to the SignedXml object.Di2015NewLine    signedXml.AddReference(reference);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Reference reference2 = new Reference();Di2015NewLine    reference2.Uri = "#" + keyInfoRefId;Di2015NewLine    signedXml.AddReference(reference2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the Signature IdDi2015NewLine    signedXml.Signature.Id = Signature;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Compute the signature.Di2015NewLine    signedXml.ComputeSignature();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the XML representation of the signature and saveDi2015NewLine    // it to an XmlElement object.Di2015NewLine    XmlElement xmlDigitalSignature = signedXml.GetXml();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Append the Signature element to the XML document.Di2015NewLine    if (headerNode != null)Di2015NewLine    {                Di2015NewLine        headerNode.AppendChild(doc.ImportNode(xmlDigitalSignature, true));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return doc.InnerXml;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static X509Certificate2 GetCertificateBySubject(string CertificateSubject)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Check the args.Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(CertificateSubject))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("CertificateSubject");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Load the certificate from the certificate store.Di2015NewLine    X509Certificate2 cert = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    X509Store store = new X509Store(StoreName.My, StoreLocation.CurrentUser);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Open the store.Di2015NewLine        store.Open(OpenFlags.ReadOnly | OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find the certificate with the specified subject.Di2015NewLine        cert = store.Certificates.Find(X509FindType.FindBySubjectName, CertificateSubject, false)[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Throw an exception of the certificate was not found.Di2015NewLine        if (cert == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new CryptographicException("The certificate could not be found.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Close the store even if an exception was thrown.Di2015NewLine        store.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return cert;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4819098Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomSignedXml : SignedXmlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public CustomSignedXml(XmlDocument doc) : base(doc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override XmlElement GetIdElement(XmlDocument doc, string id)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // see if this is the key info being referenced, otherwise fall back to default behaviorDi2015NewLine        if (String.Compare(id, this.KeyInfo.Id, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) == 0)Di2015NewLine            return this.KeyInfo.GetXml();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return base.GetIdElement(doc, id);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4821100Di2015UniqueSeparatorLockBits
4821100Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Bitmap TrimBitmap(Bitmap source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Rectangle srcRect = default(Rectangle);Di2015NewLine    BitmapData data = null;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        data = source.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, source.Width, source.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[data.Height * data.Stride];Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(data.Scan0, buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        int xMin = int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine        int xMax = 0;Di2015NewLine        int yMin = int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine        int yMax = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < data.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < data.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte alpha = buffer[y * data.Stride + 4 * x + 3];Di2015NewLine                if (alpha != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (x < xMin) xMin = x;Di2015NewLine                    if (x > xMax) xMax = x;Di2015NewLine                    if (y < yMin) yMin = y;Di2015NewLine                    if (y > yMax) yMax = y;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (xMax < xMin || yMax < yMin)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Image is empty...Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        srcRect = Rectangle.FromLTRB(xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (data != null)Di2015NewLine            source.UnlockBits(data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Bitmap dest = new Bitmap(srcRect.Width, srcRect.Height);Di2015NewLine    Rectangle destRect = new Rectangle(0, 0, srcRect.Width, srcRect.Height);Di2015NewLine    using (Graphics graphics = Graphics.FromImage(dest))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        graphics.DrawImage(source, destRect, srcRect, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return dest;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4821100Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Bitmap TrimBitmap(Bitmap source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Rectangle srcRect = default(Rectangle);Di2015NewLine    BitmapData data = null;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        data = source.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, source.Width, source.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[data.Height * data.Stride];Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(data.Scan0, buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int xMin = int.MaxValue,Di2015NewLine            xMax = int.MinValue,Di2015NewLine            yMin = int.MaxValue,Di2015NewLine            yMax = int.MinValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool foundPixel = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find xMinDi2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < data.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool stop = false;Di2015NewLine            for (int y = 0; y < data.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte alpha = buffer[y * data.Stride + 4 * x + 3];Di2015NewLine                if (alpha != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    xMin = x;Di2015NewLine                    stop = true;Di2015NewLine                    foundPixel = true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (stop)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Image is empty...Di2015NewLine        if (!foundPixel)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find yMinDi2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < data.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool stop = false;Di2015NewLine            for (int x = xMin; x < data.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte alpha = buffer[y * data.Stride + 4 * x + 3];Di2015NewLine                if (alpha != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yMin = y;Di2015NewLine                    stop = true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (stop)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find xMaxDi2015NewLine        for (int x = data.Width - 1; x >= xMin; x--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool stop = false;Di2015NewLine            for (int y = yMin; y < data.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte alpha = buffer[y * data.Stride + 4 * x + 3];Di2015NewLine                if (alpha != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    xMax = x;Di2015NewLine                    stop = true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (stop)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find yMaxDi2015NewLine        for (int y = data.Height - 1; y >= yMin; y--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool stop = false;Di2015NewLine            for (int x = xMin; x <= xMax; x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte alpha = buffer[y * data.Stride + 4 * x + 3];Di2015NewLine                if (alpha != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yMax = y;Di2015NewLine                    stop = true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (stop)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        srcRect = Rectangle.FromLTRB(xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (data != null)Di2015NewLine            source.UnlockBits(data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Bitmap dest = new Bitmap(srcRect.Width, srcRect.Height);Di2015NewLine    Rectangle destRect = new Rectangle(0, 0, srcRect.Width, srcRect.Height);Di2015NewLine    using (Graphics graphics = Graphics.FromImage(dest))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        graphics.DrawImage(source, destRect, srcRect, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return dest;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4821741Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<Place> GetPlaces(SearchRequest request)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var c = new Context())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var placereturn = c.Places.AsEnumerable();Di2015NewLine                if (request.StartTime.HasValue)Di2015NewLine                    placereturn = c.Places.Where(s => s.Time.Any(t => t.StartTime >= request.StartTime));Di2015NewLine                if (request.EndTime.HasValue)Di2015NewLine                    placereturn = c.Places.Where(s => s.Time.Any(t => t.EndTime >= request.EndTime));Di2015NewLine                if (request.DayOfWeek.HasValue)Di2015NewLine                    placereturn = c.Places.Where(s => s.Time.Any(t => t.DayOfWeeks.Any(z => z.Name == request.DayOfWeek.Value)));Di2015NewLine                return placereturn;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

4822414Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IQueryable<Client> GetTopLevelData(Guid agentGuid, int year)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var clients =Di2015NewLine        from client in ObjectContext.ClientsDi2015NewLine        join cbc in ObjectContext.Client_Bucket_Client on client.Client_GUID equals cbc.Client_GUIDDi2015NewLine        join acb in ObjectContext.Agent_Client_Bucket on cbc.Client_Bucket_GUID equals acb.Client_Bucket_GUIDDi2015NewLine        where acb.Agent_GUID == agentGuidDi2015NewLine        select client;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var clientInfos =Di2015NewLine        from c in clientsDi2015NewLine        select newDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Client = c,Di2015NewLine            TransactionInfos = ObjectContext.TransactionsDi2015NewLine                .Where(t => t.Client_GUID == c.Client_GUID && t.Year == year)Di2015NewLine                .Select(t => newDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Transaction = t,Di2015NewLine                    ToAttach = ObjectContext.Forms.Where(f => f.Transaction_GUID == t.Transaction_GUID && f.Year == year) //.OrderByDescending(fo => fo.Create_Date)Di2015NewLine                })Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Looping over this query will hit the database *once*Di2015NewLine    foreach (var info in clientInfos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var transactionInfo in info.TransactionInfos)Di2015NewLine            transactionInfo.Transaction.Forms.Attach(transactionInfo.ToAttach);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        info.Client.Transactions.Attach(info.TransactionInfos.Select(t => t.Transaction));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return a queryable object; constructing a new query from this will hit the database one more timeDi2015NewLine    return clients;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

DI smarts will resolve each dependency.Di2015NewLine      // The end result is a single DataContext (wrapped by UoW) shared by all Repos.Di2015NewLine      tryDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         userRepo.Add(user);Di2015NewLine         postRepo.Add(post);Di2015NewLine         // nothing has been sent to DB yet, only two objects in EF graph set to EntityState.AddedDi2015NewLine         _unitOfWork.Commit(); // two INSERT's pushed to DBDi2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catch (Exception exc)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          ModelState.AddError("UhOh", exc.ToString());Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4822976Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const int MAX_RETRY = 2;Di2015NewLineprivate const double LONG_WAIT_SECONDS = 5;Di2015NewLineprivate const double SHORT_WAIT_SECONDS = 0.5;Di2015NewLineprivate static readonly TimeSpan longWait = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(LONG_WAIT_SECONDS);Di2015NewLineprivate static readonly TimeSpan shortWait = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(SHORT_WAIT_SECONDS);Di2015NewLineprivate enum RetryableSqlErrorsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Timeout = -2,Di2015NewLine    NoLock = 1204,Di2015NewLine    Deadlock = 1205,Di2015NewLine    WordbreakerTimeout = 30053,Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Retry<T>(Action<T> retryAction) where T : DataContext, new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var retryCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    using (var ctx = new T())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (;;)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                retryAction(ctx);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (SqlException ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!Enum.IsDefined(typeof( RetryableSqlErrors), ex.Number))Di2015NewLine                    throw;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                retryCount++;Di2015NewLine                if (retryCount > MAX_RETRY) throw;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(ex.Number == (int) RetryableSqlErrors.Timeout ?Di2015NewLine                                                        longWait : shortWait);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4826207Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main() {Di2015NewLine    var lines = new[] { "umair,i,umair", "sajid,mark,i,k,i" };Di2015NewLine    foreach (var line in lines) {Di2015NewLine        var hashtable = new Hashtable();Di2015NewLine        var records = line.Split(',');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var record in records) {Di2015NewLine            if (hashtable[record] == null)Di2015NewLine                hashtable[record] = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            hashtable[record] = (Int32)hashtable[record] + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var str = "";Di2015NewLine        foreach (DictionaryEntry entry in hashtable) {Di2015NewLine            var count = (Int32)hashtable[entry.Key];Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < count; i++) {Di2015NewLine                str += entry.Key;Di2015NewLine                if (i < count - 1)Di2015NewLine                    str += ",";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            str += ",";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Remove last comma.Di2015NewLine        str = str.TrimEnd(',');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(str);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4826207Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main() {Di2015NewLine    var lines = new[] { "umair,i,umair", "sajid,mark,i,k,i" };Di2015NewLine    foreach (var line in lines) {Di2015NewLine        var dictionary = new Dictionary<String, Int32>();Di2015NewLine        var records = line.Split(',');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var record in records) {Di2015NewLine            if (!dictionary.ContainsKey(record))Di2015NewLine                dictionary.Add(record, 1);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                dictionary[record]++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var str = "";Di2015NewLine        foreach (var entry in dictionary) {Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < entry.Value; i++) {Di2015NewLine                str += entry.Key;Di2015NewLine                if (i < entry.Value - 1)Di2015NewLine                    str += ",";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            str += ",";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Remove last comma.Di2015NewLine        str = str.TrimEnd(',');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(str);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

  public ActionResult IndexGridData(string sidx, string sord, int page, int rows)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Ermittlung der Zusatzinformationen die das Grid anzeigt (Anzahl ((ObjectQuery)auftraege).ToTraceString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Sortierung des Grids anwendenDi2015NewLine        if (sidx == "Titel" && sord == "asc")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            auftraege = auftraege.OrderBy(x => x.Titel);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (sidx == "Titel" && sord == "desc")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            auftraege = auftraege = auftraege.OrderByDescending(x => x.AuftragStatus);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // zusammen gesetztes SQL Statement speichernDi2015NewLine        //sqlstring = .AsEnumerable().ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Erstellung des JSON Objekts welches die einzelnen Auftrge enthltDi2015NewLine        var jsonauftraege = new 4828932Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class NetworkPublishingTraceListener : TraceListener {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<string> messages = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    private AutoResetEvent messagesAvailable = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    private List<TcpClient> traceViewerApps;Di2015NewLine    private object messageQueueLock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NetworkPublishingTraceListener(int port) {Di2015NewLine        // Setup code for accepting and dealing with network connections. Di2015NewLine        (new Thread(BackgroundThread) { IsBackground = true }).Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Write(string message) {Di2015NewLine        if (traceViewerApps.Count == 0) {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lock (messageQueueLock) {Di2015NewLine            messages.Add(message);               Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        messagesAvailable.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteLine(string message) {Di2015NewLine        Write(message + Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void BackgroundThread() {Di2015NewLine        while (true) {Di2015NewLine            messagesAvailable.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            List<string> messagesToWrite;Di2015NewLine            lock (messageQueueLock) {Di2015NewLine                messagesToWrite = messages;Di2015NewLine                messages = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            traceViewerApps.ForEach(viewerApp => {Di2015NewLine                StreamWriter writer = new StreamWriter(viewerApp.GetStream());Di2015NewLine                messagesToWrite.ForEach(message => writer.Write(message));Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4829968Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class AdvancedTextBlock : TextBlock {Di2015NewLine        new private String Text { get; set; } //prevent text from being set as overrides all I do here.Di2015NewLine        private String _FormattedText = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine        public String FormattedText {Di2015NewLine            get { return _FormattedText; }Di2015NewLine            set { _FormattedText = value; AssignInlines(); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private static Regex TagRegex = new Regex(@"\\{(?<href>[^\\|]+)\\|?(?<text>[^}]+)?}", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public AdvancedTextBlock() : base() { }Di2015NewLine        public AdvancedTextBlock(System.Windows.Documents.Inline inline) : base(inline) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void AssignInlines(){Di2015NewLine            this.Inlines.Clear();Di2015NewLine            Collection<Hyperlink> hyperlinks = new Collection<Hyperlink>();Di2015NewLine            Collection<String> replacements = new Collection<String>();Di2015NewLine            MatchCollection mcHrefs = TagRegex.Matches(FormattedText);Di2015NewLine            foreach (Match m in mcHrefs) {Di2015NewLine                replacements.Add(m.Value);Di2015NewLine                Hyperlink hp = new Hyperlink();Di2015NewLine                hp.NavigateUri = new Uri(m.Groups["href"].Value);Di2015NewLine                hp.Inlines.Add(m.Groups["text"].Success ? m.Groups["text"].Value : m.Groups["href"].Value);Di2015NewLine                hp.RequestNavigate += new RequestNavigateEventHandler(hp_RequestNavigate);Di2015NewLine                hyperlinks.Add(hp);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            String[] sections = FormattedText.Split(replacements.ToArray(), StringSplitOptions.None);Di2015NewLine            hyperlinks.DefaultIfEmpty(null);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0, l = sections.Length; i < l; i++) {Di2015NewLine                this.Inlines.Add(sections.ElementAt(i));Di2015NewLine                if (hyperlinks.ElementAtOrDefault(i) != null) {Di2015NewLine                    this.Inlines.Add(hyperlinks[i]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void hp_RequestNavigate(object sender, RequestNavigateEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine            RequestNavigate(sender, e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // Summary:Di2015NewLine        //     Occurs when navigation events are requested.Di2015NewLine        public event RequestNavigateEventHandler RequestNavigate;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

4835528Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static object DataRowMapper(DataRow dataRow, Type type, string prefix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var returnObject = Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var property in type.GetProperties())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (DataColumn key in dataRow.Table.Columns)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string columnName = key.ColumnName;Di2015NewLine                if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(dataRow[columnName].ToString()))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(prefix) || columnName.Length > prefix.Length)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        String propertyNameToMatch = String.IsNullOrEmpty(prefix) ? columnName : columnName.Substring(property.Name.IndexOf(prefix) + prefix.Length + 1);Di2015NewLine                        propertyNameToMatch = propertyNameToMatch.ToPascalCase();Di2015NewLine                        if (property.Name == propertyNameToMatch)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            Type t = Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(property.PropertyType) ?? property.PropertyType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            object safeValue = (dataRow[columnName] == null) ? null : Convert.ChangeType(dataRow[columnName], t);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            property.SetValue(returnObject, safeValue, null);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return returnObject;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (MissingMethodException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4845682Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static int Clockwise (Point p0, Point p1, Point p2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const double epsilon = 1e-13;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double dx1 = p1.X - p0.X;Di2015NewLine        double dy1 = p1.Y - p0.Y;Di2015NewLine        double dx2 = p2.X - p0.X;Di2015NewLine        double dy2 = p2.Y - p0.Y;Di2015NewLine        double d = dx1 * dy2 - dy1 * dx2;Di2015NewLine        if(d > epsilon) return 1;Di2015NewLine        if(d < -epsilon) return -1;Di2015NewLine        if((dx1*dx2 < -epsilon) || (dy1*dy2 < -epsilon)) return -1;Di2015NewLine        if((dx1*dx1+dy1*dy1) < (dx2*dx2+dy2*dy2)+epsilon) return 1;Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
4845682Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static bool LineIntersects(Point p1,Point p2, Point q1,Point q2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (Clockwise(p1,p2,q1) * Clockwise(p1,p2,q2) <=0) &&Di2015NewLine            (Clockwise(q1,q2,p1) * Clockwise(q1,q2,p2) <=0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

4847620Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string StripHtml(this string source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] removeElements = new string[] { "a", "script" };Di2015NewLine    string _newString = source;Di2015NewLine    foreach (string removeElement in removeElements)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (_newString.ToLower().Contains("<" + removeElement.ToLower()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _newString = _newString.Substring(0, _newString.ToLower().IndexOf("<" + removeElement.ToLower())) + _newString.Substring(_newString.ToLower().IndexOf("</" + removeElement.ToLower() + ">") + removeElement.Length + 3);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return _newString;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4851953Di2015UniqueSeparatorIValidationProvider
4851953Di2015UniqueSeparatorValidationException
4851953Di2015UniqueSeparatorsealed class ValidationProvider : IValidationProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Func<Type, IValidator> validatorFactory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ValidationProvider(Func<Type, IValidator> validatorFactory)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.validatorFactory = validatorFactory;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Validate(object entity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var results = this.validatorFactory(entity.GetType())Di2015NewLine            .Validate(entity).ToArray();        Di2015NewLine        if (results.Length > 0) throw new ValidationException(results);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ValidateAll(IEnumerable entities)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var results = (Di2015NewLine            from entity in entities.Cast<object>()Di2015NewLine            let validator = this.validatorFactory(entity.GetType())Di2015NewLine            from result in validator.Validate(entity)Di2015NewLine            select result).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (results.Length > 0) throw new ValidationException(results);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4859121Di2015UniqueSeparator        /// difference between set and add and replaceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// add property do not use to add key which is already exist in memcacheDi2015NewLine        /// set use to overwite the key if that is already exist in memcacheDi2015NewLine        /// if key already exist ,replace property can replace it other wise not,where else set property use to replce if key already exist other wise it will add new key in the memcacheDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ///ImportantDi2015NewLine        ///Di2015NewLine        /// if u are fetching the key which do not exist in memcache it will return null,as well if u are fetching the key whose value is null in memcache it will return nullDi2015NewLine        /// so avoid inserting the key with null valueDi2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        ///If you simply want to avoid key colision between different types of data, simply prefix your key with a useful string. For example: "slash_1", "pradeep_1".  Di2015NewLine        ///Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// FlushAll() method use to remove(Flush) every thing from memcacheDi2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// Stats() gives every information about the memcache like total items,connections,pId etc.....Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// difference between increment,decrementDi2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// to use Increment or Decrement first u need to store counter by StoreCounter method else u will get nullDi2015NewLine        ///Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// difference between GetMultiple and GetMultipleArrayDi2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        ///GetMultiple gives u the object with there key  where else GetMultipleArray only gives u the object not the keyDi2015NewLine
4859186Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic int search(byte[] haystack, byte[] needle)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i <= haystack.Length - needle.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (match(haystack, needle, i))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return -1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic bool match(byte[] haystack, byte[] needle, int start)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (needle.Length + start > haystack.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < needle.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (needle[i] != haystack[i + start])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
